story:
**UPDATE 8/13**


Almost there, only 3 more days left!  We're so happy with the support we've gotten for this project we decided to add a bonus bust image for everyone whose pledge is $15 or more.  Just for fun, 'cause we love ya!  If you haven't participated yet don't miss the opportunity to have this babe signed and sent to you!  You can hang him on your wall if you want, we won't tell.

____________________
WOW you guys are really awesome!  We're over half-way to our goal & we couldn't have done it without ya!  To show our love, here's a sneak peek at ALL FOUR of the themed bust illustrations you can choose from starting at the $15 level.  These little guys are going to be printed and shipped out with the books and we'll sign em for you, to boot! 

Thanks to all of our contributors and to everyone who helped spread the word so far.  We've got about 2 weeks left to meet our goal, so let's make it count!!


steampunk, punk


post apocalyptic, cyberpunk

___________________________

 

WHAT'S GOIN ON HERE?

We are a selection of fine artists across the globe coming together to bring you alternative indie punk comic goodness!  This zine is full of individuals giving their take on what punk can be, from gritty-city cyberpunk to government upheaving anarchist leather-clad rockers.  In charge of the project are Amb0rg and Anique, two Seattle comic artists looking to dive head-first into the industry.  We want our first project to be awesome & jam-packed with amazing art which is why we've invited several awesome artists to participate in this book including

  • Ashley Davis
  • Angimoto
  • Brian Lee

By contributing some funds you will be helping a bunch of awesome people get their work printed in a REAL COOL BOOK!

 

BREAKIN' IT DOWN!

  • This book will be available to purchase online and at conventions starting this fall!

  • Our first print run is going to be 150 books strong at a flat cost of $450, and the next $200 will cover all of our packing and shipping costs!

One cool thing about this project is that we hope to be able to give our contributing artists a chunk of money as well.  Therefore, ALL extra donations and proceeds from sales will be evenly divided among our artists!

We have some pretty sweet perks for those of you who contribute money to our cause, too!  Most levels are gonna earn you a copy of the zine to call your very own, but you've got the opportunity to have us draw art for you, include your name & website in the book as a contributor, or even have your very own dedication page!  We really want to reward our funders as much as we want to help our artists, so it's worth it to help out!

If we don't reach our goal, all funds will still go directly to ordering books & the rest will come out of our (very small) pockets!  We will fight tooth & nail to make sure this book gets printed, but a lack of donation means almost no promise of payment for our artists, and possible delays in shipping.  We all have to work together to spread the word and make this comic a success!

MORE INFO

By supporting this campaign you will be helping several artists expand their reach & giving them an opportunity to have their work in a professional, printed book.  You will single-handedly be supporting budding artists in their first foray into printed works & helping the comics community as a whole! 

_________________________________


About the Art Rewards

11x17 print reward

  • A pledge of $15 or $25 will net you a themed illustration.  You can choose from the following categories: steampunk, cyberpunk, post-apocalyptic, or a more traditional rock punk. 



 





  • Backers receiving custom illustrations ($50-$200) will be able to choose Amber or Anique to do their piece.  We will contact you ASAP to discuss the details of your commission, so be thinking about what you would like!

 

Art pieces will be created & delivered a bit later than the books, but should all be finished no later than January 31, 2013. 

Keep in mind that books will be sent to your address no later than November 30 2012.  If your address changes between then & the time you donate, please let us know so we can make sure we send your stuff to the right place!

Thanks y'all!


http://www.indiegogo.com/punkedcomic?a=555221

story:
Hi, we're CAKE. The Chicago Alternative Comics Expo. Separately, we are Edie Fake, Grace Tran, Jeff Zwirek, Max Morris, and Neil Brideau. Together we've spent the last 2 years organizing the first alt. comics festival to come to Chicago in over 15 years.

The Chicago Alternative Comics Expo [CAKE] is a weekend-long celebration of independent comics, inspired by Chicago’s rich legacy as home to many of underground and alternative comics’ most talented artists– past, present and future. Featuring comics for sale, workshops, exhibitions, panel discussions and more, CAKE is dedicated to fostering community and dialogue amongst independent artists, small presses, publishers and readers.

CAKE is free and open to the public, but due to some unexpected expenses, we've fallen a little short of our budget.

In addition to helping us remain solvent this year, any money you contribute will help us remain independent and to grow the show for next year and hopefully for many years to come.

The organizers for CAKE are all volunteers, so any money you give will go directly into the festival and making it the best festival for attendees and exhibitors.

What we need from you

We're looking to raise $3000. Why $3000? That's basically the amount it will take to cover the expenses we didn't expect. (First year shows sheesh!)

It will also provide the nest egg for next years show.

Once again, all organizers for CAKE are volunteers (i.e. we aren't getting paid anything) so whatever you give towards all the things that make a festival great, like...

  • Attracting top level talent
  • Exhibiting in a convenient and vibrant location
  • Advertising, so other cool people like you find out about our event
  • And the really fun stuff, like table rentals!

Cool stuff you get if you contribute

Feel free to contribute without a reward, but we have some nifty gifts to bring a piece of the festival home with you.

  • Cool Buttons
  • Assorted mini-comics
  • Amazing Comics Anthologies
  • T-shirts
  • Original Art
  • Sponsorship

 

Check Out Our Amazing List of Guest and Exhibitors!

http://www.cakechicago.com/?page_id=105

 

Tweet out a Facebook Viral

So, you can't afford to give us money, we get it (we're cartoonists, believe me we get it) but there's other ways to help.

Help us spread the word about the show by posting about in all the social media ways. Failing that, use your mouth! Gab has been proven as the most effective way to communicate to another human being, the thoughts and information that are inside your head. It's science!

story:
Meet Beardo.

Beardo is the alter-ego of award-winning writer, artist, and musician Dan Dougherty. His comics career began in 2006 with the graphic novel Cyclone Bill and the Tall Tales. He’s since illustrated dozens of books in multiple genres, including the children's books (Sam & The Jungle Band and You Got A Boogie), comic series (Touching Evil, also written by Dan), graphic novels (The Apocalypse Plan and Bob Howard: Plumber Of The Unknown) and the horror anthology Haunting Tales Of Horrorbles.

Beardo is the back to back winner of the prestigious Shel Dorf Award for Syndicated Print Strip of the Year (2012 and 2013), and Dan's comic series Touching Evil won the 2013 Shel Dorf for Self-Published Comic of the Year. Dan lives south of Chicago with his wife Megan, and their two dogs, Penny Lane and Abbey Road.

What we need to do with Beardo...

ComicMix is bringing the first three volumes of Beardo back into print and adding the fourth book in the series out in time for Christmas!

Book 1, Beardo: The Art Degree Guarantee, will be coming out in May 2014 (ISBN: 978-1-939888-02-0, also available through Diamond and Ingram). Book 2, Beardo: Brew Harder!, will be coming out in July 2014. Book 3, Beardo: Til Debt Do Us Part, will be coming out in September 2014. Book 4, Beardo: Self-Employee Of The Month, is expected to be coming out in November 2014.

What you get.

As part of our pre-ordering campaign, you have the chance to get items that have never been made available before, like a genuine Beardo comb, coffee mugs, tee-shirts, original art from the series, or custom commissioned work just for you!

Stretch goals? Of course there are stretch goals!

Dan doesn't know we're doing this yet, but hey, we want to give you some incentive.

  • If we raise $5000, Dan will have his full beard shaved down to a Van Dyke beard.
  • If we raise $7500, Dan will have his beard shaved down to a mustache.
  • If we raise $10000, Dan will have his full beard shaved off.
  • If we raise $30000, Dan will have his head shaved.
  • If we raise $50000, we're going to shave everything off of Dan, except what would be covered by a standard bathing suit. And his eyebrows. (We don't want him to look too weird.)
And yes, we'll videotape the process and post it for everyone to see.

Need to know more?

Ask for information right here, or see Dan directly at C2E2 this year!

story:
Hi, I’m Doxy. I am an veteran artist working in the adult art industry. I have been an adult artist for 10+ years. Recently, I’ve started physical editions my current comics, with versions available for both the Japanese and the international market.

This campaign is for the international print release of my comic, “Sweet Sting.” You now have the opportunity to get your hands on your very own physical copy of this story to add to your collection!

 

“Sweet Sting” follows everyone’s favorite lagomorph law enforcer as she becomes embroiled in her most thrilling case yet. Rumors are going around of dangerous new drug being distributed in the city’s red light district and our protagonist decides to dive deep undercover to get to the center of this mystery.

Will she stay strong in the face of countless temptations, or will she lose herself before she discovers the truth?

We are looking to raise a minimum of $1000 USD in order to do a print run of 200 copies of the book. Should demand and funding run higher than that, we will print more!

 

We have different versions of the book available depending on your support level. Support the tier with the rewards you are interested in, and we will make sure you receive them!

story:
JUST HOURS LEFT - PROJECT ENDS TODAY FRIDAY 1/8 at 12:00 PST!

Don't miss out!  Get your copies today!!!

 

HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

 

ORDER BY MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY 12-23 FOR THE BEST PRICES ON DAVID FINCH RED SONJA COMICS & MERCH!

 

STRETCH GOALS!!!

The David Finch Red Sonja Limited Edition Variant has been such a great project.  Everyone is loving the amazing illustration and making sure you are a part of history as David delivers his first Red Sonja work!  To help celebrate and keep that magic going we are thrilled to be announcing our first stretch goal!

We already unlocked the first stretch goal - now every pledge backer will receive an awesome limited edition promotional trading card featuring David's beautiful Red Sonja art!  And if we can reach $25,000 every pledge level backer will receive a second free limited edition promotional Red Sonja trading card featuring the amazing Black & While Line Art of this sweet cover!  These rare gems will be a perfect addition to the comic book editions you pick up in this campaign.  The books and trading cards are going to be extremely rare and without a doubt the center piece of your Red Sonja collection!

STRECH GOAL #2 ACHIEVED

STRETCH GOAL #1 ACHIEVED!

 

LEGENDARY ARTIST DAVID FINCH CREATES AN EPIC RED SONJA EDITION!

David Finch is a legend!  His illustrations have defined major characters and events for decades and now he is turning his beautiful linework toward the She-Devil With a Sword!  David is one of the most sought after comic artists in the world and he is a fan favorite for convention goers looking for his sleek art style.  Behold...David Finch's Red Sonja!

A SHORT HISTORY OF DAVID FINCH'S EXCITING COMICS

David burst onto the scene illustrating Cyberforce in 2003 and things exploded from there.  His work on Aphrodite IX was outright stunning.  He's illustrated Ultimate X-Men and The New Avengers for Marvel.  And his work on Moon Knight was a pivotal run that redefined the character! But his influence goes even beyond the four color world of comics.  In 2008 he illustrated the cover to Disturbed's Indestructible album.  And he did design work for the 2009 Watchmen movie.  In 2016 he teamed with writer Tom King to launch Batman Vol 3 as part of the Rebirth line at DC.

Photo (c) Luigi Novi

"RED SONJA:

THE PRICE OF BLOOD"

"Price of Blood" is the newest series in Red Sonja's epic adventures and David Finch is helping Dynamite celebrate the upcoming release of issue #1 with his own limited edition cover.

Writer Luke Lieberman (Red Sonja: Birth of the She-Devil) and fan-favorite artist Walter Geovani (Gail Simon's run of Red Sonja) team-up to tell an early tale of the adventures of Red Sonja!
Under a series of incredible covers by Linser, Geovani, Golden, Suydam, and a cosplay cover -- Red Sonja faces the gallows! For all the blood she spilled, there is a price. This is the tale of how she came to such a pass.

OTHER GREAT ITEMS FROM DAVID...

story:
COMBAT JACKS is my new creator-owned project and is being treated as a ONE SHOT sci fi/horror comic in the vein of the old EC WEIRD SCIENCE FANTASY meets VAULT of HORROR books from the 50's. Jack O' Lanterns have always been considered creepy and crafting scary ones with a knife has always been a Halloween mission. Creating a story about living, monsterous Jack O' Lanterns indigenous to another planet seemed like a natural place to go for a fun sci fi/ horror project.

 

The synopsis of the story started with the idea of a marine squad with high tech weaponry sent to investigate the disappearance of prison terraformers on the new found planet Maia. Because of the abundance of pumpkin-like vegetation on Maia, the planet was deemed habitable by the human race because of the oyxgen the plants produced. And there lies the rub... A Venus Fly trap, if you will..

Heres an excerpt: "(Corporal)DAD(aka Dorothy) hears him and alerts the rest of us, “…CONTACT! 5 O‘CLOCK, 20 METERS” Before we know what has happened…they’re on us. Large gangly, misshapen demonic-looking Jack O’Lanterns with spindly, vine-shaped bodies smacking at us from all different directions. Somehow, these innate looking pumpkins awoke from the pumpkin patch and were now demons from Hell and far worse then any Nightmare Before Christmas I could ever imagine."

 

Putting this 24 page book together and seeking publishing is no small task. I'm hoping to raise a minimum of $3000 to pay for a good amount of the project and printing(if need be). I have a beautiful cover already, pencilled by comics great, TOM RANEY, inked by myself, MARK McKENNA, and to be colored by old ally and great comic artist, MIKE McKONE. I have secured the interior pencil art by the excellent JASON BAROODY(soon to post art!) with interior inks by myself. TBD as for colors and letters...

 

Heres the interesting part... I have a couple of publishers "informally" interested in looking further into the possibility of publishing JACKS. If that were to happen that would take away the possibility of me as a self publisher or an indie publisher taking the helm. That would change the game as far as the rewards coming from me personally, but I will see to it that all pledges are honored, even if I have to buy and supply the comics from a 3rd party...

story:
Short Summary

Hi there! We are Freaks Don't Bite, a company created by 3 strange, artistic and driven women made to infiltrate the illustrative community, with wit, positivity and a different approach to individuality.

We met in college and hit it off, realized even with our varying styles to art and creativity, our message is the same:

 That the world is becoming more and more diverse, that more canadians are mixing nations, that our country is becoming a hot bed of nations within nations. It can be confusing, frustrating and most importantly alienating. We want to reach out to the world and show that being different is not so different. That there are more people looking to experience the beauty that resides in all cultures. That no matter your sex, cree, background or upbringing we all want the same thing. To be happy, fed and to feel good about being who we are. 

What we do

Our team is made up of illustrators, graphic designers, web designers and artists. We all work as independent artists in order to continue to work on our collective project: Freaks Don't Bite. We are all versed in HTML, CS Suites and anything art oriented. We are available for commission pieces, or contract work.

What we want to do

Using FDB as a platform we would like to keep creative projects running, There are graphic novels and cartoons in the works and most importantly we would like to give back to the community by giving workshops for children.

Considering the arts are getting less and less funding in our schools we would like to donate our time and expertise to those less fortunate, as well as support other artists getting launched who may have a harder time getting noticed. We believe in teamwork and positivity, there is enough exploitation in the world, lets work together to fill it with more exuberance!

With your contribution, you will not only help our business but help the artistic community by allowing us to spread the word of creativity and passion for all things weird.

What We Need & What You Get

We will need $3,000 in funding to grow our business. Our intention is to have another computer to streamline our workflow. We would like to grow and continue working on  our projects, things like graphic novels and cartoons to help spread the word! We have put a lot of blood sweat and tears into this company, and we still believe that we can make a difference.

The Impact

Freaks Dont Bite is based on the idea that being weird isn't a bad thing. Because of our similar up-bringings, we noticed that there is a lack of confidence, especially when it comes to self-expression within our community.

Sex has become too much of a focus when it comes to impact, amd as much as we can appreciate human rights, we also believe that being playful doesn't necessarily mean exposing yourself. By accepting our inner misfit we are all still beautiful and can thrive.

We hope to celebrate this with our creativity, intelligence and ingenuity, using our products, we hope to shed light on these issues and spread positivity and hopefully create a community in which people learn to be more accepting of differences and people can express themselves more freely without having to worry about trends or media expectations.


We have already began making changes within our community and spread positivity to all the people we encounter. But we need to reach greater heights if we want to continue to grow.

Other Ways You Can Help

If your bank account is empty, never fear! You can still help us by getting the word out!

Just share the link or use the indiegogo share tools to spread the news about our campaign. Any contribution will help us immensely! Thank you for your time and stay classy!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hi there! We are Freaks Don't Bite, a company created by 3 strange, artistic and driven women made to infiltrate the illustrative community, with wit, positivity and a different approach to individuality.
We met in college and hit it off, realized even with our varying styles to art and creativity, our message is the same:
 That the world is becoming more and more diverse, that more canadians are mixing nations, that our country is becoming a hot bed of nations within nations. It can be confusing, frustrating and most importantly alienating. We want to reach out to the world and show that being different is not so different. That there are more people looking to experience the beauty that resides in all cultures. That no matter your sex, cree, background or upbringing we all want the same thing. To be happy, fed and to feel good about being who we are. 
What we do
Our team is made up of illustrators, graphic designers, web designers and artists. We all work as independent artists in order to continue to work on our collective project: Freaks Don't Bite. We are all versed in HTML, CS Suites and anything art oriented. We are available for commission pieces, or contract work.
What we want to do
Using FDB as a platform we would like to keep creative projects running, There are graphic novels and cartoons in the works and most importantly we would like to give back to the community by giving workshops for children.
Considering the arts are getting less and less funding in our schools we would like to donate our time and expertise to those less fortunate, as well as support other artists getting launched who may have a harder time getting noticed. We believe in teamwork and positivity, there is enough exploitation in the world, lets work together to fill it with more exuberance! 
With your contribution, you will not only help our business but help the artistic community by allowing us to spread the word of creativity and passion for all things weird.


What We Need & What You Get

We would like to grow and continue working on  our projects, things like graphic novels and cartoons to help spread the word! We have put a lot of blood sweat and tears into this company, and we still believe that we can make a difference.

We hope to celebrate this with our creativity, intelligence and ingenuity, using our products, we hope to shed light on these issues and spread positivity and hopefully create a community in which people learn to be more accepting of differences and people can express themselves more freely without having to worry about trends or media expectations.

story:
Welcome to The Zombie Kronicles. 

We are launching our first Graphic Novel, accompanied by a full ninety-minute production of a MOTION GRAPHIC NOVEL™. 

$25,000 will help us,

  • Complete a solid print run of the first edition.
  • Complete the post production on the Motion Graphic Novel™.
  • Develop a line of cool TZK™ merchandise.
  • Begin work on the SEQUEL.

Please take a look at our project. We hope you like it.

Here are a few random pages from our brand new Graphic Novel... 

THE ZOMBIE KRONICLES VOL: II

      

And here is a six minute preview of The MOTION GRAPHIC NOVEL™ version, with a full binaural sound production (put your ear phones on)!

We hope you enjoyed it. 

  • We want to talk about ZOMBIES!
  • We want to talk about mind-blowing CONSPIRACIES!
  • We want to talk about ALIENS!
  • We want to talk about the END of the WORLD!

Honduras 2012 - a  geneticist, working for a Swiss biotech company, receive a DNA sample from a U.S. intelligence team, working somewhere in Africa.  Their orders were simple... clone it! 

Here is his last transmission from the facility...(as seen in our MOTION GRAPHIC NOVEL™ releasing October 11th 2014).

Two years later, NASA scientists noticed an anomaly on the surface of The Sun... 

That summer, six friends head to Florida for a final camping vacation before they all head off to college.

One year later... 95% of the world's population are dead.

How are they connected?

Want to see some more backstory? WatchThe Hidden History of Earth.

Here's a video, explaining who we are and what we need - (8 minutes duration)

Koralis Entertainment, Inc. is a start up company creating exciting, original content across a multitude of platforms.

For the last two years, we have been developing our first title. As anyone who ever started a business knows, it takes time to get going.

But we are almost ready and we have decided to ask you if you’ll help us publish and market our project.

If you go to our website at www.thezombiekronicles.com you will see that we have a great product.

Our first title is THE ZOMBIE KRONICLES Vol: II.

Why did we start there? Because it is the part of the story that relates to what is happening NOW!  It is the story of how a small group of friends managed to unwittingly unleash an apocalypse. But our story won't end there...it didn't begin there. 

There will be many more volumes to come. 


We are offering great perks with this crowd funding, including a chance to be the first to see our groundbreaking MOTION GRAPHIC NOVEL™.  

In addition, donors to our campaign will also have a chance to own a FIRST EDITION of our GRAPHIC NOVEL, SIGNED by our creative team.             

Want to receive a limited edition poster of world renowned cosplayer, Lindsay Elyse modeling as Bethany? When you select this perk, please send us a message with your desired poster. 

Poster #1

Poster #2   

Poster #3

Poster #4

OR....... want to receive a limited edition poster of world renowned cosplayer, Stacey Rebecca modeling as Rita? 

AND, we have fully mastered RING TONES which will make your blood run cold...

                                              

AND for only the cost of a trip to the cinema for two people, you can own a limited edition SIGNED print copy of the GRAPHIC NOVEL and a full MOTION GRAPHIC NOVEL™ to experience again...and again...and again.

AND we have T-Shirts.

          

AND we have bound, signed copies of the SCREENPLAY.

     

AND we have a chance for you to be a contributor to the next story through our FOCUS GROUP.

AND we have ORIGINAL ART BOARDS up for grabs. One trip to ebay will show any collector what an original art board can be worth in the years to come.

      

PLUS much much more.

We know that not everybody can contribute. If you can't, don't worry. You can register on our website for updates and freebies. You can also share this campaign with your friends. 

We hope you'll consider helping us. 
Thanks.

story:
"Elman's Nightmare's"

  • Elman España-Internationally published model/Cover model/Runway model/Actor/Published comic book super villain/Painter/Mixed martial artist/Rebel
  • Basically this book enters my life and reality of working the long hours that i do till i eventually crash out in m work desk and enter my nightmares! the possibilities are endsless!
  • Running this campaign to bring a unique comic for my fans from me to them.

What We Need & What You Get

  • $3500 should cover all expenses for the artwork and paying my team to be able to produce this comic book from the artist,letterer and printing costs.
  • Perks range from stickers,Original concept art,Prints,Physical copies etc. 
  • If the goal is not reached of $3500 all funds will still go to making this happen!

 

Other Ways You Can Help!!!

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

•Share on your social media sites a share can go a long way!

story:
My name is Ken Austin and I am the creator of Haven Knights, an on going story of several adventuring heroes on a quest to save the realm from certain doom. While I still have limited copies of the first three issues left, this is a stand alone story and the 4th issue of the book which I plan to continue producing. I am a solo artist and use traditional methods of creating and publishing this comic on my own to include freehand pencils of each page, inking, scanning the pages in and digitally coloring them, lettering, assembling the comic prior to shipping it off to be printed.

I am in the final stages of production which include finishing up on the colors prior to shipping the product off to be printed. Without further delay or obstacles the planned completion date will be mid October with a release date in early November. This campaign is designed as more of a pre-release for fans of the first three issues as well as new fans to get a guaranteed copy of Haven Knights #4 autographed, along with a chance to get finished original comic pages of the book itself which of course will also be autographed.

Most of the production costs have been planned for and the needs of the campaign as far as monetary support will go to improving the quality of the book as well as production costs to further the story in the next episode of Haven Knights.

Don't miss out on this next chapter, get involved today for some great perks.

story:
Ugly Monsters

Ugly Monsters is a naughty and humoristic comic celebrating gay urbanite life. The Monsters' nights (and morning afters) are all about dating, partying, self-reflection and underwear brands. While H-P discovers the content of his pants, Jojo is trying to get his phone-addicted boyfriend's attention and Lulu craves fast food and hot guys. And so on. All of them are way too old to still be in their 20s (shh, it's a secret) but the Monsters don't mind and keep on goofing around. 

Ugly Monsters promotes sex and body positivity, plays around with gay stereotypes and gives attention to gay topics that have not been on display that much before. Regardless of the gay aspect, Ugly Monsters are characters that anyone can relate to. 

The comic is created by Joakim Juvelén, a graphic designer and comic artist from Finland, who sometimes uses himself and his friends as material for his comics. With his comics Joakim wants to increase conversation about being gay and in this way improve knowledge of minorities.  It's not okay that being gay is still an ugly thing nowadays. 

 

Rumat Möröt

Rumat möröt on roisi ja riemukas homosarjakuva, jossa mörkökaverukset seikkailevat deittailun, bilettämisen, itsetutkiskelun ja kalsarimerkkien kyllästämässä maailmassa. Siinä missä yksi ihmettelee housujensa sisältöä, toinen on perso roskaruualle ja miehille. Kolmas kiukuttelee, jotta saisi huomiota kännykkäriippuvaiselta poikaystävältään. Parikymppisiksi möröillä on liikaa ikää (hys, salaisuus), mutta se ei näy käytöksessä – asioita tehdään ja möläytellään sen enempää ajattelematta. 

Rumat möröt  rummuttaa seksi- ja kehopositiivisuuden puolesta, leikittelee homomaailman stereotypioilla sekä käsittelee myös siihen liittyviä, vähemmän esillä olleita puolia. Möröt ovat hahmoja, joihin voivat homonäkökulmasta huolimatta samaistua kaikki.  

Sarjakuvan on luonut Joakim Juvelén, helsinkiläinen graafikko ja sarjakuvataiteilija, joka toisinaan ammentaa aiheita sarjakuviinsa niin omasta kuin ystäviensäkin elämästä. Sarjakuvillaan Joakim haluaa lisätä keskustelua homoudesta. Ei ole ok, että homous ruma asia vielä nykypäivänäkin.
 

 

About the book

The comic book is going to be a hardcover book, 120 pages, 18 × 18 cm (7 × 7 inches) and over 50 % of the content is going to be new, never published material. The book content is going to be black and white with pink highlights and full color covers. The book will be published in two different language versions (English and Finnish) in October 2020. 

The book will be self-published through BoD. This way the content and design will be in line with my vision. In order for this book project to come true, we need to collect 1000 euros through crowdfunding.

You can choose from several different perks. Some of the perks are available only in a limited quantity. Everyone who supports the book project will get their name mentioned in the thank you section of the book (both versions: English and Finnish). Perks are only available through this Indiegogo campaign.  


Book information:

  • Hardcover
  • 120 pages, high quality paper (120 g/m²)  
  • Size: 18 × 18 cm (7 × 7 inches)
  • Content in black and white with pink highlights, full color covers
  • Over 50 % of the comics is new, never published material
  • Two language versions (English and  Finnish) 
  • Out in October 2020  
  • The book is still unnamed and the cover art is not the final version, it might change a bit.
     

About perks:

  • A thank you in the book. Everyone who supports the book project will get their name mentioned in the thank you section of the book. The name will be the same one the donation was made in. The name will be in both language version (English & Finnish).
  • The book is available in English and Finnish languages. The versions differ by few pages.
  • Wall calendar for 2021. Will be printed on high quality paper 140 g/m². Size 21 × 21 cm (8 × 8 inches), size 42 × 21 cm (16 × 8 inches) when open. You can choose between English and Finnish language versions.
  • Portrait with a Monster art print. You need to send a print quality picture of yourself. Specific details and wishes for the portrait will be agreed upon via email during August. The picture will be in black and white, with pink background. The picture will be printed on high quality paper,  140 g/m². Size 18 × 18 cm (7 × 7 inches).  
  • Previously released Ugly Monsters comic book is available only in English.
  • Unfortunately the perks that include two books can't be sent outside of Europe. The postal expenses of these packets would be too high.

Timeline:

  • Indiegogo campaign starts the 29th of June 2020 
  • Indiegogo campaign ends the 16th of August 2020   
  • Finishing the book August 2020
  • Printing the book September 2020 
  • Sending the book + perks in October 2020

 

 

Albumista

Vielä nimeämätön sarjakuva-albumi tulee olemaan kovakantinen, 120-sivuinen, kooltaan 18 × 18 cm ja sen sisällöstä yli 50 % on uutta, ennen julkaisematonta materiaalia. Kirja tulee olemaan sisällöltään mustavalkoinen pinkillä tehostevärillä ja värillisillä kansilla. Kirja julkaistaan sekä suomeksi että englanniksi lokakuussa 2020. 

Kirja julkaistaan omakustanteisena BoD-palvelun kautta, jotta se on täysin visioni mukainen: saan päättää sen sisällöstä ja ulkoasusta itse. Jotta kirjaprojekti toteutuu, täytyy Indiegogo-kampanjalla saada kerätyksi 1000 euroa.

Kirjasta on valittavissa useampia erilaisia vastikepaketteja (perks), joista voit valita haluamasi. Osaa vastikepaketeista (perks) saatavilla vain rajoitettu erä. Jokainen kirjaprojektia tukenut saa nimensä painettuna kirjan molempien kieliversioiden (suomi ja englanti) kiitosteksteihin projektin tukijana. Vastikepaketit (perks) saatavilla vain tämän Indiegogo-kampanjan kautta.

 

Kirjan tiedot:  

  • Kovakantinen  
  • 120 sivua, laadukasta paperia 120 g/m²  
  • Koko 18 × 18 cm  
  • Sisältö pääosin mustavalkoista pinkillä tehostevärillä, värilliset kannet 
  • Sisällöstä yli 50 % on uutta, ennen julkaisematonta materiaalia  
  • Julkaistaan sekä suomeksi että englanniksi  
  • Ilmestyy lokakuussa 2020
  • Albumi on vielä nimeämätön ja sen kansitaide saattaa muuttua vielä hiukan
     

    Vastikepaketeista (perks):

    • Nimi kiitosteksteissä. Jokainen kirjaprojektia tukenut saa nimensä kirjan molempien kieliversioiden kiitosteksteihin projektin tukijana. Nimi, joka kirjan kiitosteksteihin painetaan, tulee olemaan sama jolla lahjoitus tehdään. 
    • Tulevasta sarjakuva-albumista on valittavissa kaksi eri kieliversiota (suomi ja englanti). Kieliversioiden sisältö eroaa toisistaan muutaman sivun osalta.
    • Seinäkalenteri vuodelle 2021. Painetaan laadukkaalle paperille 140 g/m². Koko 21 × 21 cm, koko avattuna 42 × 21 cm. Valittavissa englannin- tai suomenkielinen versio.
    • Potretti Mörön kanssa -taideprintti. Potrettia varten sinun tulee lähettää painotasoinen kuva itsestäsi. Kuvan sisällöstä sovitaan tarkemmin sähköpostitse elokuun aikana. Kuva tulee olemaan mustavalkoinen vaaleanpunaisella taustalla. Kuva painetaan laadukkaalle paperille,  140 g/m². Koko 18× 18 cm.
    • Aiemmin ilmestynyt Ugly Monster -sarjakuva-albumi on saatavilla vain englanninkielisenä.

    • Vastikepaketteja (perks), joissa kaksi kirjaa, ei valitettavasti voida lunastaa Euroopan ulkopuolelta. Näiden pakettien postikulut nousevat liian korkeiksi.
       

    Projektin aikataulu:

    • Indiegogo-kamppanja alkaa  29. kesäkuuta 2020
    • Indiegogo-kamppanja loppuu 16. elokuuta 2020 
    • Sarjakuva-albumin viimeistely elokuussa 2020 
    • Sarjakuva-albumin painatus syyskuussa 2020  
    • Sarjakuva-albumien ja vastikkeiden lähetys lokakuussa 2020

     

     

    Tell a friend

    You can also support the Ugly Monsters comic book vol 2 project by telling your friends about it and sharing our Indiegogo page on social media. You can use the Indiegogo share tools.  Thank you in advance!  

    If you have any questions about the campaign, don’t hesitate to contact us: weareuglymonsters@gmail.com. 

    Get to know the Ugly Monsters by visiting our Instagram page: instagram.com/ugly.monsters. 

     

    Kerro kaverille

    Voit myös tukea Rumat möröt -sarjakuvaprojektia kertomalla siitä kavereillesi ja jakamalla kamppanjaamme sosiaalisessa mediassa. Voit käyttää tähän Indiegogon jakotyökaluja (Indiegogo share tools). Kiitos!

    Jos sinulla on jotain kysyttävää projektista, ota rohkeasti yhteyttä: weareuglymonsters@gmail.com

    Tutustu Mörköihin myös Instagramissa: instagram.com/ugly.monsters

Rumat Möröt
Rumat möröt on roisi ja riemukas homosarjakuva, jossa mörkökaverukset seikkailevat deittailun, bilettämisen, itsetutkiskelun ja kalsarimerkkien kyllästämässä maailmassa. Siinä missä yksi ihmettelee housujensa sisältöä, toinen on perso roskaruualle ja miehille. Kolmas kiukuttelee, jotta saisi huomiota kännykkäriippuvaiselta poikaystävältään. Parikymppisiksi möröillä on liikaa ikää (hys, salaisuus), mutta se ei näy käytöksessä – asioita tehdään ja möläytellään sen enempää ajattelematta. 
Rumat möröt  rummuttaa seksi- ja kehopositiivisuuden puolesta, leikittelee homomaailman stereotypioilla sekä käsittelee myös siihen liittyviä, vähemmän esillä olleita puolia. Möröt ovat hahmoja, joihin voivat homonäkökulmasta huolimatta samaistua kaikki.   
Sarjakuvan on luonut Joakim Juvelén, helsinkiläinen graafikko ja sarjakuvataiteilija, joka toisinaan ammentaa aiheita sarjakuviinsa niin omasta kuin ystäviensäkin elämästä. Sarjakuvillaan Joakim haluaa lisätä keskustelua homoudesta. Ei ole ok, että homous ruma asia vielä nykypäivänäkin. 


 
About the book
The comic book is going to be a hardcover book, 120 pages, 18 × 18 cm (7 × 7 inches) and over 50 % of the content is going to be new, never published material. The book content is going to be black and white with pink highlights and full color covers. The book will be published in two different language versions (English and Finnish) in October 2020. 
The book will be self-published through BoD. This way the content and design will be in line with my vision. In order for this book project to come true, we need to collect 1000 euros through crowdfunding.
You can choose from several different perks. Some of the perks are available only in a limited quantity. Everyone who supports the book project will get their name mentioned in the thank you section of the book (both versions: English and Finnish). Perks are only available through this Indiegogo campaign.  
Book information:

Hardcover
120 pages, high quality paper (120 g/m²)  
Size: 18 × 18 cm (7 × 7 inches)
Content in black and white with pink highlights, full color covers
Over 50 % of the comics is new, never published material
Two language versions (English and  Finnish) 
Out in October 2020  
The book is still unnamed and the cover art is not the final version, it might change a bit. 


About perks:

A thank you in the book. Everyone who supports the book project will get their name mentioned in the thank you section of the book. The name will be the same one the donation was made in. The name will be in both language version (English & Finnish).
The book is available in English and Finnish languages. The versions differ by few pages.
Wall calendar for 2021. Will be printed on high quality paper 140 g/m². Size 21 × 21 cm (8 × 8 inches), size 42 × 21 cm (16 × 8 inches) when open. You can choose between English and Finnish language versions.
Portrait with a Monster art print. You need to send a print quality picture of yourself. Specific details and wishes for the portrait will be agreed upon via email during August. The picture will be in black and white, with pink background. The picture will be printed on high quality paper,  140 g/m². Size 18 × 18 cm (7 × 7 inches).  
Previously released Ugly Monsters comic book is available only in English.
Unfortunately the perks that include two books can't be sent outside of Europe. The postal expenses of these packets would be too high.


Timeline:

Indiegogo campaign starts the 29th of June 2020 
Indiegogo campaign ends the 16th of August 2020   
Finishing the book August 2020
Printing the book September 2020 
Sending the book + perks in October 2020

 

 
Albumista
Vielä nimeämätön sarjakuva-albumi tulee olemaan kovakantinen, 120-sivuinen, kooltaan 18 × 18 cm ja sen sisällöstä yli 50 % on uutta, ennen julkaisematonta materiaalia. Kirja tulee olemaan sisällöltään mustavalkoinen pinkillä tehostevärillä ja värillisillä kansilla. Kirja julkaistaan sekä suomeksi että englanniksi lokakuussa 2020. 
Kirja julkaistaan omakustanteisena BoD-palvelun kautta, jotta se on täysin visioni mukainen: saan päättää sen sisällöstä ja ulkoasusta itse. Jotta kirjaprojekti toteutuu, täytyy Indiegogo-kampanjalla saada kerätyksi 1000 euroa.
Kirjasta on valittavissa useampia erilaisia vastikepaketteja (perks), joista voit valita haluamasi. Osaa vastikepaketeista (perks) saatavilla vain rajoitettu erä. Jokainen kirjaprojektia tukenut saa nimensä painettuna kirjan molempien kieliversioiden (suomi ja englanti) kiitosteksteihin projektin tukijana. Vastikepaketit (perks) saatavilla vain tämän Indiegogo-kampanjan kautta.
 
Kirjan tiedot:  

Kovakantinen   

120 sivua, laadukasta paperia 120 g/m²  

Koko 18 × 18 cm  
Sisältö pääosin mustavalkoista pinkillä tehostevärillä, värilliset kannet  
Sisällöstä yli 50 % on uutta, ennen julkaisematonta materiaalia  
Julkaistaan sekä suomeksi että englanniksi  
Ilmestyy lokakuussa 2020

Albumi on vielä nimeämätön ja sen kansitaide saattaa muuttua vielä hiukan 



Vastikepaketeista (perks):

Nimi kiitosteksteissä. Jokainen kirjaprojektia tukenut saa nimensä kirjan molempien kieliversioiden kiitosteksteihin projektin tukijana. Nimi, joka kirjan kiitosteksteihin painetaan, tulee olemaan sama jolla lahjoitus tehdään. 
Tulevasta sarjakuva-albumista on valittavissa kaksi eri kieliversiota (suomi ja englanti). Kieliversioiden sisältö eroaa toisistaan muutaman sivun osalta.
Seinäkalenteri vuodelle 2021. Painetaan laadukkaalle paperille 140 g/m². Koko 21 × 21 cm, koko avattuna 42 × 21 cm. Valittavissa englannin- tai suomenkielinen versio.

Potretti Mörön kanssa -taideprintti. Potrettia varten sinun tulee lähettää painotasoinen kuva itsestäsi. Kuvan sisällöstä sovitaan tarkemmin sähköpostitse elokuun aikana. Kuva tulee olemaan mustavalkoinen vaaleanpunaisella taustalla. Kuva painetaan laadukkaalle paperille,  140 g/m². Koko 18× 18 cm.

Aiemmin ilmestynyt Ugly Monster -sarjakuva-albumi on saatavilla vain englanninkielisenä.
Vastikepaketteja (perks), joissa kaksi kirjaa, ei valitettavasti voida lunastaa Euroopan ulkopuolelta. Näiden pakettien postikulut nousevat liian korkeiksi. 


Projektin aikataulu:

Indiegogo-kamppanja alkaa  29. kesäkuuta 2020
Indiegogo-kamppanja loppuu 16. elokuuta 2020  
Sarjakuva-albumin viimeistely elokuussa 2020  
Sarjakuva-albumin painatus syyskuussa 2020  
Sarjakuva-albumien ja vastikkeiden lähetys lokakuussa 2020


 

 
Tell a friend
You can also support the Ugly Monsters comic book vol 2 project by telling your friends about it and sharing our Indiegogo page on social media. You can use the Indiegogo share tools.  Thank you in advance!  
If you have any questions about the campaign, don’t hesitate to contact us: weareuglymonsters@gmail.com. 
Get to know the Ugly Monsters by visiting our Instagram page: instagram.com/ugly.monsters. 
 
Kerro kaverille
Voit myös tukea Rumat möröt -sarjakuvaprojektia kertomalla siitä kavereillesi ja jakamalla kamppanjaamme sosiaalisessa mediassa. Voit käyttää tähän Indiegogon jakotyökaluja (Indiegogo share tools). Kiitos!
Jos sinulla on jotain kysyttävää projektista, ota rohkeasti yhteyttä: weareuglymonsters@gmail.com
Tutustu Mörköihin myös Instagramissa: instagram.com/ugly.monsters

story:
Chasity and Zack live a life that some people would only dream of,  expensive vacations, lavish homes, cars and more, but they also have a secret.  Loyal and faithful Zack accepts and begrudgingly supports Chasity's promiscuity and lifestyle choices, including her recent obsession with earning an invitation to LURE, a exclusive invite-only event for those involved in the partner-swapping lifestyle.

But are they truly ready to learn the TRUE and horrifying cost of being there?

Lure is an 80-page graphic novel that is full of suspense, drama, and frightening situations, that will stay with readers long after the story is over.

story:
Project

Hello! My name is Megan Uosiu and I'm the author of the "Lazy Snow Leopard" webcomic. The goal of this project is to gather enough money to print this webcomic into an actual, physical comic book. And then get it delivered to your house!

About me

| DeviantArt | SmackJeeves | Tapastic | Tumblr | Twitter | Instagram | Facebook |

I'm Megan Uosiu. I'm a freelance illustrator and I work for game development companies when I get the opportunity to. In my free time I do illustrations and comics. My dream from a long time ago is to be a mangaka, or a comic book artist.
I've been drawing since I was a little child and I think it is finally time for me to turn this hobby into a real full-time work. But before that I want to make at least one of my dreams come true  - to get a copy of my printed comic book on my shelf.
I've been drawing comics for some time now, but due to some circumstances (like a hard disk crashing xD) I was never able to. So this will be my very first comic book published EVER. I'm really excited for this and I hope this campaign will help me make it true.
Since I started talking about my dreams, I will share another one with you all.
For over 10 years now me and my artist friends have had this art club called MDH, that is like a drawing circle to us. Together we started many projects, but haven't quite finished most of them. By making this project successful I would also like to get their motivation in place, so that all of them will finish their own personal projects like mine (which all of them are awesome, by the way). So I hope this project will be just a beginning. For me. And for all of us.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!


... So, what is my comic about?

Plot summary

An utterly lazy god, an anthropomorphic personification of the Snow Leopard, rests upon his favourite tree, when suddenly woken up by a thrown stone.  The thrower turns out to be a young admirer of his former self. The youngster persuades the lazy god to begin a quest for fame, glory and world salvation. While the one concerned would have preferred to just lie down and go back to sleep.

Comics

This is the main idea of my story, set in the universe that is a mix of the samurai and fantasy world, with a touch of modern times. You can read the first three chapters of it on SmackJeeves' "Lazy Snow Leopard" webcomic page already.

But I would be really happy to see my book printed and to put it on my shelf as well. With your help, I can make this happen!

The plan is to print it on A5 format, black and white on 80g/m2 white paper, with a laminated paperback full-colour one-side print cover.

If I can gather at least 1000$ I should be able to print about 100 copies and send it to the receivers without using my own funds. And that would be really awesome!

Goals

If I can gather 1000$ the comic will be printed. But that's not all...!

If I can gather 1500$ I will redraw some of the pages of chapter 1 and add tones to make it look more similar to the rest of the comic.

With 2000$ I will add chapter 4 to the first three chapters that are already done.

If I can gather 3500$ the printing will get cheaper, so I will either get some better paper for the book, or make the cover with a wrapper, or make the cover double-sided colour print, with additional graphics.

If I can gather 5000$ I will add a few colour illustrations at the beginning or end of the comic book.

And if I can gather 6000$ I will redraw the first few pages in colour, to make it look even more like a real manga.

With 7000$ I will add chapter 5 to the comic book vol. 1.

And if by some miracle I can hit 10 000$ with this, I will start working on volume 2 of the comic book right away, instead of looking for another job. ;D



And finally - here's how you can help me make it all happen:

Perks


Support - 1$
Hello, I see you like my webcomic. Thank you so much!

"Lazy Snow Leopard" vol.1 - 20$
A printed signed copy of the "Lazy Snow Leopard" comic book shipped to your house. (No cover yet.)
(Shipping price included.)

LSL+RandomSkb1 - 40$
"Lazy Snow Leopard" comic book vol.1 + "Random Sketchbook 1" shipped to your house. (Shipping price included.)
"Random Sketchbook 1" is the first book I ever printed. It contains sketches of the original characters from my other stories, some of which have webcomics also.

LSL+RandomSkb1+MiniSkb - 50$
"Lazy Snow Leopard" comic book vol.1 + "Random SKetchbook 1" + mini-sketchbook "Feather" shipped to your house. (Shipping price included.)
"Feather" is one of the two mini sketchbooks I drew for the overseas conventions I went to. They contain never published sketches connected somehow to the title of the sketchbook, but the characters themselves are random.
The postcards you can choose from the list - please write the numbers of the postcards you'd like in your order or to my e-mail: megan.uosiu@gmail.com.

LSL+RandomSkb1+2xMiniSkb - 60$
"Lazy Snow Leopard" comic book vol.1 + "Random SKetchbook 1" + two mini-sketchbooks "Feather" and "Lantern" shipped to your house.
"Lantern" is another one of the sketchbooks I drew in the past and never published anywhere. It is a bit older than "Feather".

LSL + original drawing inside - 45$
A signed printed copy of my comic book, with a simple drawing of the Lazy Snow Leopard by me inside it + 5 postcards, shipped to your house. (Shipping price included.)
If you like my drawings and would like a personal touch in your copy of the comic book, I will draw your favourite character for you inside of it. Please include the details in your order or send me an e-mail to: megan.uosiu@gmail.com.

THANK YOU!

Additional info

Also, please feel free to exchange your 5 posters for an equivalent of them from this listing: GOODS SHOP.
For example: 5 posters =5$. You can exchange it for 2 buttons(2x2$) and 1 poster(1$) or 1 keychain(5$) or 1 button(2$) and 1 keychain(3$), etc.
Please note that I have limited supplies of some of those, so your first choice might not work out. I'm really sorry about this. But I hope you will find something to your liking in there. ♥ 


Other Way You Can Help

You like my project, but can't help by buying a copy yourself? Please spread the word. <3 I will have a give away going for people who help me promote my comics later, so please check out my DeviantArt for details!
Thank you! ♥

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT ONCE AGAIN! <3 *hugs*

story:
Issue #1 available digitally through ComixCentral

Meet Juan Quintanilla, a hero-watcher in a world inhabited by masked superheroes and villains. When Juan's favorite heroine, Badger Babe, suddenly goes missing, replaced by a strange doppelganger, Juan sets out on a journey to find her. The 3-part series: Journey of the Juan,  follows Juan's transformation from meager internet e-celeb to the most unlikely of superhero: JUANPOOL!!!

The evolution of Juanpool from concept to the page has been an incredible story. Originally created as a meme for a tongue-in-cheek contest for a YouTube channel, Juanpool quickly gained a life of his own as a fan favorite, and would eventually become Troy's very first self-produced comic book. Created while on hard times, living out of the back of his car, Troy's first effort would go on to be nominated for ComixCentral's Comic of the Year award, where it consistently holds a spot in the Top 10. Now, with the backing of the Science Wizard Comics label, Troy can finally do what less than a year ago seemed impossible: Do a print run!

This campaign is to cover the printing costs of Issues #1 and #2, and get them out to the fans who support this campaign ASAP. It also will give Troy the latitude that he needs to set up his work space and make The Journey of the Juan a masterpiece.

If we do exceed our goals, we have plans for stretch goals. Want to know what they are? Then help us spread the word, so we can hit them.

Issue 1

Issue 2

While this is our first crowdfunding campaign, we have an amazing network of friends and colleagues that have completed successful campaigns, and are helping us to make sure that this runs smoothly and on time. Back our book and help us reach our goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can't contribute monetarily, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please share our campaign on social media and visit the Science Wizard Comics Website for more info and updates on the Juanpool comic, digital purchases, merchandise, mailing list, and upcoming projects and events.

www.sciencewizardcomics.com 

Follow Science Wizard Comics on...

  • Twitter: @ScienceComics
  • Facebook: fb.me/ScienceWizardComics
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sciencewizardcomics/
  • Minds: www.minds.com/ScienceWizardComics
  • Gab: www.gab.ai/ScienceWizardComics
  • YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwgwv__SbpfwGN...

And make sure to also follow Troy on...
 

  • Twitter: @MistahMahvel
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mistahmahvel/
  • YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnG15us_L1XwQt...

story:
In the long forgotten realm of 2020 in the inkiest of tobers a scroll detailing the escapades of certain coven of witches was revealed. I set straight to work documenting the existence of this Eclectic Coven in pen rendered pictographs. For the first time these original 32 drawings from October 2020 are being collected along with some older and newer witch art, sketches and ramblings from my archive. There will also be a bonus mini comic featuring the witch Phoebe.  All together over 40 pages of bewitching goodness. Looking forward to sharing this collection with you.

All artworks for the book are already complete. Each rendered in beautiful black ink. Elegant and bold. Also never before seen process sketches for some of the drawings will be included.

You can choose between the digital and the physical version of the book. The digital version is ideal for the budget minded and for my international fans. The physical version will be a must for collectors as it includes the first comic appearance of Phoebe, the main character in my upcoming comic Phoebe Raises Hell. All physical backers will receive the digital rewards as well. Whichever version you choose I hope you will enjoy the book as much as I enjoyed drawing it.

All artwork painstakingly etched into digital format for your viewing pleasure.

Faithfully reproduced from the original pictographs for this physical format

Early Backer Special: signed physical copy of Eclectic Coven & 2 stickers *30 available

“The wise choose silent observation over ignorant bellowing.” These are the words over the entrance to the main hall of our mountaintop monastery. Still not sure exactly what they mean. Our silent sect of monks have focused our efforts on perfecting the ultimate form of communication, comics. As such I have been drawing ever since I could hold a pencil. My influences are: Mythology and ancient art, tattoo art of many cultures, and Eastern, Western and European comics. I mash all this together to create my style. Though it may be a bit niche I hope my art delights you.

There will be bonuses for digital and physical backers.

Risks & Challenges

Admittedly this is my first campaign, but I have done everything in my power to limit the risk to you. The artwork for the book is already complete, that leaves printing and shipping.  I have consulted with other creators who have fulfilled campaigns to make sure these other steps go as smoothly as possible and given myself ample time to complete these steps.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to back the campaign you can still help by spreading the word.
story_txt:
In the long forgotten realm of 2020 in the inkiest of tobers a scroll detailing the escapades of certain coven of witches was revealed. I set straight to work documenting the existence of this Eclectic Coven in pen rendered pictographs. For the first time these original 32 drawings from October 2020 are being collected along with some older and newer witch art, sketches and ramblings from my archive. There will also be a bonus mini comic featuring the witch Phoebe.  All together over 40 pages of bewitching goodness. Looking forward to sharing this collection with you.


All artworks for the book are already complete. Each rendered in beautiful black ink. Elegant and bold. Also never before seen process sketches for some of the drawings will be included.










You can choose between the digital and the physical version of the book. The digital version is ideal for the budget minded and for my international fans. The physical version will be a must for collectors as it includes the first comic appearance of Phoebe, the main character in my upcoming comic Phoebe Raises Hell. All physical backers will receive the digital rewards as well. Whichever version you choose I hope you will enjoy the book as much as I enjoyed drawing it.

All artwork painstakingly etched into digital format for your viewing pleasure.

Faithfully reproduced from the original pictographs for this physical format

Early Backer Special: signed physical copy of Eclectic Coven & 2 stickers *30 available


“The wise choose silent observation over ignorant bellowing.” These are the words over the entrance to the main hall of our mountaintop monastery. Still not sure exactly what they mean. Our silent sect of monks have focused our efforts on perfecting the ultimate form of communication, comics. As such I have been drawing ever since I could hold a pencil. My influences are: Mythology and ancient art, tattoo art of many cultures, and Eastern, Western and European comics. I mash all this together to create my style. Though it may be a bit niche I hope my art delights you.


There will be bonuses for digital and physical backers.



Risks & Challenges
Admittedly this is my first campaign, but I have done everything in my power to limit the risk to you. The artwork for the book is already complete, that leaves printing and shipping.  I have consulted with other creators who have fulfilled campaigns to make sure these other steps go as smoothly as possible and given myself ample time to complete these steps.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you are unable to back the campaign you can still help by spreading the word.

story:
Short Summary

The Abyssal Tournament of Champions has begun. Achilles has proven himself worthy of his place through his clash with the first hero Gilgamesh! However, Achilles' return to peace has been stalled as Hades makes an offer he just can't refuse. He now joins the ranks of the Champions of Hades alongside Theseus, slayer of the Minotaur, and Herakles, the mighty hero who conquered the 12 labors. Together they will fight to win this tournament, and their next opponent is a foe that has yet to be defeated in the arena.... the champion of Egyptian Lord of the Dead, Osiris.

 

Victory is the only way forward and the stakes are higher than any of the heroes realize! Welcome to the Pyramid Gambit! 

 

54 pages of story and a Character Glossary in the book!

 

Story: Michael Oden

Art: Marcelo Oliveira Costa

Lettering: Es Kay

Editor: Katrina Roets

 

Main Cover by Marcelo Oliveira Costa:

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to make this dream continue. We had a successful funding on our Zero issue of almost $9,000 USD. But for this book we aim to go even further, while we have a much lower stretch goal so we can hit In DEMAND sooner, we are hoping to breach 10k and maybe even hit 20k if possible! To aid in this process we have MANY different perks for this book and have established stretch Goals. 

For the main book you will get a squarbound graphic novel with around 60 pages of story as well as a character glossary to give the reader context and information about all the champions in our story! There are 5 Variant Covers of the main book to give plenty of variety and choice to our readers.

Art Preview Lettered by Es Kay

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Dragon Guard Variant by Kevin Sharpe and Alonso Espinoza (Art Team for The Dragon Guard on INDIEGOGO) 

 

Inks:

 

Creator Variant by Michael Oden and Marcelo Oliveira Costa


 

A limited 100 copy print Hardcover (cover art done by the talented Scott Rosema) that collects the Zero issue AND The Pyramid Gambit. This book also includes an art gallery of all character concepts, covers, and pinup art between the Zero issue and Pyramid Gambitt and will be signed by me. 

Scott Rosema Deluxe Edition Cover:

 


 

Tedd Lehman  and Farah Nurmaliza Support Our Troops Variant

 

 

 

Justin Hunt Pin Up:

(Final Will be Colored by Alonso Espinoza)


Joe Tolliver Mailing List Exclusive Pin Up:


Luke Stone Trading Cards:
Unlocked by Stretchgoal 2! 

Retailer Perk Have the Liberty Guarantee! 

9 Realms Publishing values the Retailers that are willing to invest in ourproducts and as such we value them just as any individual customer. It is because of this that we wanted to make sure we found a way to make sure that those Retailers that support us get their books with extra care taken to ensure they are safe. Enter Liberty Distribution! We are excited to announce that all our distribution to retailers will be handled by Liberty Distribution, an up and coming distributor that uses a specialized mailer to ensure high volume books make it to the retailers with extra care and damage free! 

CLICK ME TO KNOW MORE!

www.ledg.us

 

Stretchgoals: 

-Fully Funded (2,000): Every copy of Elysian Fields: The Pyramid Gambit will be signed by me, the humble creator of Elysian Fields! 

-March to 10k (5,000): Trading Cards with art drawn by the fantastic Luke Stone will come with each basic tier of the book! 
- Surpassing the Zero Issue (10,000): Mark of Hades Sticker for all backers! 

-The Story Endures (20,000): 10 additional pages of story will be added to Pyramid Gambit! 

-30k ?????????

-40k ?????????

-50k ?????????

 

Additionally, as we did with the Zero issue, 20 copies of the main cover book will be donated to the Special Forces Warrior Clinic at Walter Reed Hospital. 

The Impact

Elysian Fields is more than just a book at this point, it's a statement of change. That the industry is becoming a place where the fans of these books no longer have to be ignored by the Big 2 and instead of having their criticisms ignored, they can instead strike out on their own and make a book that appeals to themselves and other likeminded fans. There is a dire need of Escapism in the world right now, a break from all the misery and darkness, an escape to a world of heroes that preservere and the rules of reality need not apply. This is what is at the heart of Elysian Fields, a fantasy for its readers to escape to and enjoy as mythic legends clash in a grand, epic scale!

 

The impact we have is going beyond the industry, however. While we eventually added a Support Our Troops tier to the Zero Issue Campaign, we did so late in the game and so sadly we were not able to do much in that regard. However, we are thrilled to announce our partnership for this campaign in The Special Forces Charitable Trust. This brilliant organization provides relief to not only the veterans of this very elite communtiy, but their families as well. To help them in their mission we will be donating $10/ sale of any Support our Troops Package or The Whole Enchilada tiers, along with the wholesale of the Justin Hunt Original Art for his pinup to The Special Forces Charitable Trust. 

CLICK ME TO KNOW MORE! 

https://www.specialforcescharitabletrust.org/

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is not raising the money needed to move forward, I want to keep making this book, but if the support isn't there than the consumer has chosen. We hope to continue Elysian Fields as long as possible, but that cannot be done without your support. So let's make Elysian Fields the success I know it can be together! 

Other Ways You Can Help

I realize that the times are trying for a great deal of people, so If you're looking for ways to help then please share around! I have listed below some great places to share the campaign:

-Social Media: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram... you name it the platform of Social Media is the most efficient form of marketing to spread the word. Posting the campaign in Comic Related groups, or as your status and tagging people potentially interested would be greatly appreciated. 

-YouTube: There are lots of Comic Reviewers on Youtube, repeatedly posting the campaign in the comments on Comic Reviewers Youtube increases our footprint and could potentially sway some of these Youtubers to look our direction and put a spotlight on us! 

Thanks for checking us out and I hope to see everyone on our contribution list!

story:
Nicky “The Buzzard” Shane

“EVEN BUZZARDS DREAM”

Nicky “The Buzzard” Shane is finally taping his live, one hour comedy special called “Even Buzzards Dream” at the Wolf Theater in the Clarion Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, Nevada, September 2013. The multi-camera shoot will then be shopped to major cable networks. 

If you have never seen “The Buzzard” live, it’s a one of a kind experience. Theatrically brilliant and stand-up hilarious “The Buzzard” toured America, Canada and Mexico for twenty years receiving standing ovations in every town while collecting a good size following. 

The Buzzard has a one-of-a-kind presence. He appears on stage like an uncle who hasn’t stopped drinking since he lost his office job. His five grit sandpaper voice has a lot to say about growing up off the grid in a motor-home, being bi-polar, the job market, x-wives (“I used to toss egg shells in front of me just to walk around her…”) suicide, gambling, drinking, drugs and social issues. Buzzard now lives in West Hollywood, California which is primarily a gay community. “There are only three children attending the elementary school there, says The Buzzard, “They had to bus kids in from the heterosexual burbs just to have a recess.”  

Critics rave “The most CONTROVERSIAL STAND-UP COMEDIAN working today. New York Post “Buzzard’s off the grid comedic-ally. He’s inadvertently incoherent but his gift is that he is also very funny! It’s obvious he’s a stand-up comic because no other trade or job would have him.” 

In 2005 Nicky “The Buzzard” Shane established the first wind instrument speed record as Guinness World Record’s “Fastest Harmonica Player”. The Buzzard will be cranking up a cool exhibition of his harmonica dexterity during his show. Don’t miss it!! The very funny Rolan Whitt is opening!  

Check out Nicky ”The Buzzard” Shane on Facebook 

http://www.facebook.com/thebuzzardcomedy

and you will see why he needs a better video.

 

BUDGET

Wolf Theater Rental/Clarion Hotel and Casino              $1,500.00

Video Production/Post Production                               $4,100.00

Travel/Food/Lodging                                                   $1,000.00

Marketing                                                                  $  750.00

Rolan Whitt/Opening Act                                             $  300.00

DVD Package & Duplication                                        $  450.00

Perks/Indiegogo Fees/Paypal Fees                              $1,470.00

story:
Short Summary

  The artist who illustrates my comics, Francis Llamzon, lives in the Philippines.  Fortunately, he and his family were not hit by the storm but he does know people who were and intends to help them monetarily.  I want to do the same but I can only afford to give so much.  I am running this project to attempt to raise more money to send to help the victims of this tragedy.  
  Using my minute popularity in the indie comic field, I hope to succeed in giving enough to at least help one family out in their recovery.      

What We Need & What You Get

  Whether you truly want to help or just love comics, this is a great way to help those in need.  Normally, projects relating to comics on this site as well as other crowd funding sites would offer the same deal for 5-10 USD. I will only be offering PDF versions of the comics because there is no shipping involved and 100% of the funding can be sent to Francis to help those in need.  Actually, between 91-96% because indiegogo charges 4% on projects that meet their goal and 9% on those that don't.    

About Myself, Jared Carver

  Indiegogo is the only major crowd funding site that allows funding to be allocated to non profit causes.  To see some of my previous comics you can view my previous successful projects at:

http://www.kickstarter.com/profile/196420473/created

  I have been working on comics on my free time in the US Army since early last year with Francis Llamzon.  I enjoy making fantasy genre as well as modern comedies.  Next year my contract will end and I will begin my pursuit of a degree in Communications.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it!
