Short Synopsis 
The galaxy is a dangerous place filled with dangerous creatures doing dangerous...things. The Weaselmeizters, a group of intergalactic bounty hunters who also happen to be weasels (yes, weasels), are here to make it a safer place. With influences ranging from Guardians of the Galaxy, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and Star Wars to Daredevil (Brubaker, Bendis, Waid), Batman (Snyder), Sex Criminals (Fraction/Zdarsky), and Rocket Girl (Montclare/Reeder), the creative team (along with Coast Comics) aims to put Weaselmeizters into your hands every other month (starting THIS September). Created by Evan Wucher, Jerry Choy, and writer Brentt Harshman, WEASELMEIZTERS is a fast-paced, action-packed, suspenseful, and fun read with gorgeous art by the talented Kamil Boettcher and Lukasz Marko, lettering by Keith Perkins, and help from Michael Colbert, help US entertain YOU. 
What We Need & What You Get
 
We are reaching for a $2,000 goal. These funds will cover all printing costs, as well as costs for ComicCon appearances and ISBN code costs. Also, this goal would cover, of course, perk & reward costs. Our perks range from a print copy of the first issue and a personalized thank-you note all the way to getting to be drawn into a future issue, and a subscription to the first 12 issues of this fantastic series! If the goal is not met, we will still be putting out the issue come end-September 2014, except now there will be less comics for comic shops and retailers across the US to get their probably-very-soft hands on. 
  The Impact
We are not DC. We are not Marvel, or Image, or Dark Horse, or IDW. We are Coast. We are an independent publishing company created by writers and artists who want to work hard, create something worthwhile, and build up a portfolio and repertoire they can be proud of. Nobody is paid upfront per-page fees. Not only does this weed out greedy collaborators, but it also shows that anyone who is willing to script, pencil, ink, color, or letter a 22-page comic truly believes in the project. Everyone in our company is paid on a per-sales ratio. Ten percent of all profit goes to the company, for maintenance, and the rest is split up entirely by the creative team. Nobody here delusions themselves with hopes of racking in millions. We all simply have dreams, and won't stop until our dreams can be held in our hands as we turn the pages we've put our heart & soul into. In Case You Weren't Convinced 
Despite its wide range of influences, WEASELMEIZTERS is unlike anything this world (or surrounding worlds) has ever seen. Genetically advanced weasels toting big guns, sporting fashionable jackets, and racking in serious money? Can't say we've heard of this before. Alongside its end-September release date, WEASELMEIZTERS will be accompanied on its first wave trek by other upcoming Coast Comics books like GONE FISHING (F.D. White, Alrissa Sia), JANEIRO'S ROYAL HELL (Gabe Cohen, Gene Schleeter), and THE ASTOUNDING AMOEBA ARMADA (Jason Russell, Mandy Marguerite).


 
 
 Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, don't worry! Simply following us on Twitter, or Instagram, or liking us on Facebook, helps! Getting the word out and telling your family/friends about us is super helpful as well.
Also, you can support WEASELMEIZTERS when its first issue launches end-September, and keep an eye out for all Coast Comics titles!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Christina, and for the last few years I've run the blog "Dragons, Zombies & Aliens," which review books and movies with a critical feminist lens.

They say write what you want to read. I want to read sci-fi and fantasy stories with powerful women, with lands that are not based off of Medieval Europe, with ugly truths and burning hope. I've managed to get a few short stories and novellas published with traditional publishing companies. But this time, I want to try something a little different: self-publish a graphic novel series.

Of course, this will not be possible without an illustrator, editor, or marketing. That's where I need your help. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In May, I'll be running a crowdfund campaign for $10K (subject to change). Most of that will go to the illustrator, a little will go to the editor, and a little more for production.

This campaign for $700 is for preliminary marketing. We need to get the word out! That means commissioning more posters from our fabulous illustrator, hitting social media, guests posts and advertising, etc. 

In return, you'll get a variety of perks. A free, signed copy of the graphic novel itself, sneak peaks of character designs and scenes, and you might even get a character named after you!

 

Risks & Challenges

I'm not going to lie: I have never self-published before. (Before this month, I've never done a crowdfund campaign before!) 

So to work the kinks out and ensure "Sovadron" doesn't fall flat on its face, I'll first be self-publishing two smaller pieces: a collection of short stories and a novella. They'll be perks for the larger May campaign. 

While I have plenty of experience writing stories and traditional books, this is also my first time writing a graphic novel. Luckily my illustrator, John Hawkins, does have experience, which is why he's worth all the money I'm raising. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help in other ways? Share this campaign on social media! Tweet it, Instagram it, blog it, use whatever you have to get the word out. 

Thank you all so much! Have a great 2018!

story:
THE STORY

Planet Earth is home to seven billion indigenous humans. unbeknownst to most of you there are thousands of aliens from a hundred species inhabiting your home. Why? Secrets like these are hard to keep and the galaxy spanning UNION OF SPECIES entrust them to AGENTS of their para military police force known as 12TH HOUR. 

THIS ISSUE

Tabbita Vaynor, code name AGENT WILD, is a Hunter Agent (assassin) for 12TH Hour who discovers a plot that threatens galactic civil war and the lives of billions including that of her Mother, the Queen of her home world and leader of the Union. What happens when your most deadly Agent wants answers? Best not to get in her way.

ISSUE #1 (of 5) 40 pgs / full color

- A 24 page main story. Written and penciled by DON WALKER. Inks by LARRY WELCH. Colors by Nicolas Chapuis with letters by ED DUKESHIRE.

NOTE: The main story is a 'Director's cut' of the original Agent Wild #0 and contains newly re-drawn pages along with new scripting a coloring throughout.

- ALL NEW 10 page back up story written by DON WALKER and penciled by the legendary MARK BEACHUM (MARVEL/DC)..

 - A completed 6 page, full color, preview of AGENT WILD: Union Fall #2. 

Below: The various covers. Reg. cover by Don Walker (pencils) Larry Welch (inks) and Steve Firchow (colors). Mark Beachum variant and Blank sketch cover.

 

Pages for the 24 pg main story!

The legendary MARK BEACHUM is illustrating a 10 page story in issue one and providing a variant cover!

Set in the future of our shared Dork Empire Ink universe are the REAPER CORPS. Issue #0 (one shot) available as well.

Example of the metal NERD KNIGHT cards. The red cards will be in gold only, while the purple will be in Silver only. These cards will feature your name and will give you special greeting when shown, in person, to our Emperor, Don Walker.

At top, the purple, silver metal NERD KNIGHT cards.

WHAT THE HECK ARE WE DOING HERE?

I'm DON WALKER and I'm the creator / writer/ penciler of AGENT WILD: Union Fall and I, along with my creative team of ULTIMATE BAD ASSES, are here to BRING the FIRE back to the comics industry and fans!

My collecting hey day were the 1980's and 1990's! Before the crossovers killed the industry. We're bringing the character driven integrity the Clairemont X-MEN with the GRAPHIC BEAUTY of the 90's Image comics! Why? Because like you, WE MISS FUN COMICS!

This comic was successfully funded on another platform, SO THE BOOK IS guaranteed to be released and we're here on IndieGoGo InDemand for those of you who may have missed your chance to get your hands on this super fun comic! We want you to experience this wild ride with us! You know you want to! LET'S DO THIS!

STRAP IN! The ride's just getting started!

What We Need & What You Get

Evey dime you contribute is gravy as the book is already funded! The more backers the more people we get to share AGENT WILD with and in the end, that's our only goal; get her into the hands of the fans!

Perks include Comics, with covers by DON WALKER and MARK BEACHUM. 4"X6" trading cards, prints, t-shirts and more. Check out the various perks. We think you'll dig them!

Risks & Challenges

The books already funded so the only risks are time of delivery. We've set a goal, but 'life' sometimes gets in the way of production. Many of our team are working professionals in the comic industry, working for much larger publishes than Dork Empire Ink. But they are pros and haven't failed us yet. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

BANG THE DRUM on social media! Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, wherever you can find a fellow comic fan. Let them know...DORK EMPIRE INK is here...and we HEAR YOU!

story:
A new age of sword & sorcery adventure awaits as Ardanna's quest begins. Created and written by  Wyatt Holliday (Rocket Gal), with art by Dean Flores and letters by Eric Weathers.

  • 24 pages
  • Full-Color

Current Status: In Fulfillment

 

The Story

Obsessed with uncovering clues that would prove his stolen birthright, Sabian traveled the globe cutting himself on broken hearts. His final voyage was 15 years ago...

Now, having been inspired by his many stories as a child, Ardanna begins the search for her missing father. As our heroine rescues Tavin Sael from the dungeons of Oakengarde Keep, Nestor of Nikias brokers a deal that will lead him to The Citadel Above the Sun. Meanwhile, dark forces rise in Tyr Ahminus...

 

Stretch Goals


All Backers - All backers will receive an exclusive foil trading card, the first Artifact of Ulim-Nur, Ardanna's Armor!

$5,000 (Unlocked!) - Legends of Ulim-Nur trading card #1: Ardanna

$9,348 (Unlocked!) - Print 9348 (Ardanna)

$10,000 (Unlocked!) - Legends of Ulim-Nur trading card #2: The Withered King

 

The Ardanna Companion

This supplemental behind-the-scenes book features design sketches, page layouts, notes, script pages, samples from the unpublished novel, and more! These will not be released elsewhere and are exclusive to The Ardanna Companion. 

  • 24 pages; black & white

Note: This item is also available as an Add-On at checkout with no additional shipping cost.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't back us right now, you can also help by following and sharing this campaign on your social media!

story:
The Creator

Created entirely by me, Rob Hansen, Chetwynd is the product of a weird mind with five months of determined idle time on my hands. I'm a professional illustrator and graphic designer/educator with 25+ years of experience in the communications industry. As a life long fan of comics, this is my first comic book.

While I created the project by myself, it's time to reach out to the community for a little support to bring the project to corporeal fruition. Printing is expensive and while this is a complete labour of love (ie. essentially a non-profit) I'd like to see the thing out there in the world as an old school physical comic book. I want people to hold it and fold it; leave it on a coffee table or shove it in a backpack. It will be available digitally as well but my experience with comics has always been with paper and staples. You can help make that dream a reality!

What We Need & What You Get

The goal for this campaign is set at $1200. As the artwork is entirely complete, I plan to use any funds raised to specifically get the darn thing printed as well as a few swag-like items like stickers, high-end prints, t-shirts, eight-foot-tall Chloroplast standees, you know...as one does.

The reward tiers are hopefully geared towards expressing my sincere appreciation for every positive comment of encouragement this project has received. That you would even consider funding this wee endeavour is equally gratifying and humbling. Every single backer will be included within a "THANKS SO F-ING MUCH" list on the inside front page along with various perks like t-shirts, prints and custom hand-drawn illustrations depending on which tier you choose. Only the finest materials are what my backers deserve.

If I don't reach the goal, no biggie! You'll still get your perk and the funds will simply go toward the printing costs. This is getting done. The amount raised will only impact the print quantity.

Can't Commit?

No worries! Share the campaign. That's a big help too!

story:
I Fratelli Blasteroid presentano: il più terrificante horror di retro-fantascienza mai realizzato a fumetti!

THE SHADOW PLANET è il quarto progetto, dopo il successo di "Rim City", "Quebrada - Seconda caduta" e di "Zeroi", dell'etichetta indipendente RADIUM. 

Un film a fumetti di 80 pagine a colori, formato comic book, per rivivere il brivido dell’orrore cosmico creato da H.P. Lovecraft in un’ambientazione di retro-fantascienza alla “Pianeta Proibito”. Razzi, bulloni, scafandri spaziali e pianeti alieni non sono mai stati più spaventosi… e sexy!

Firmano questo cocktail di retro-SF, exploitation e horror i Blasteroid Bros, il collettivo creativo formato dallo sceneggiatore Giovanni "James" Barbieri, dal disegnatore Gianluca "Johnny" Pagliarani e dal colorista Alan "Junior" D'Amico. A controllare che i fratellini facciano tutto per bene c’è l’Editor ospite Stefano Vietti, creatore con Luca Enoch di Dragonero, il celebre fantasy di Sergio Bonelli Editore.

RADIUM è orgogliosa di offrire ai suoi affezionati funders questa eccitante storia in due sontuose edizioni stampate, piene di contenuti extra esclusivi e arricchite dalle copertine di due superstar del fumetto: Mario Alberti e Jacen Burrows! 


La vicenda inizia quando l’astronave Vidar del Comando Stellare riceve un debole segnale di SOS proveniente da un pianeta disabitato.

Il comandante Jenna Scott sbarca con una pattuglia e trova i resti di una precedente spedizione scientifica, misteriosamente scomparsa.

Qualcuno o qualcosa, però, inizia a uccidere… è solo l’inizio di una terrificante lotta per la sopravvivenza che svelerà lo sconvolgente segreto di THE SHADOW PLANET!

IL CAST

Jenna Scott
Il comandante Scott può sembrare solo un bel bocconcino, ma sa come farsi obbedire e risolvere ogni situazione... finché non atterra su THE SHADOW PLANET.

John Vargo
Il sergente Vargo ha brutte abitudini e un pessimo comportamento. Dovrà combattere fino all’ultimo per sopravvivere su THE SHADOW PLANET.

Nikke Larsson
Il luogotenente Larsson è un ottimo ufficiale alle comunicazioni, ma resterà senza parole davanti all'orrore di THE SHADOW PLANET.





DIGITAL EDITION

4 uscite digitali mensili + PDF "The Shadow Planet" Director's Cut

DIGITAL EXTRA
RADIUM Wallpaper Set + THE SHADOW PLANET Wallpaper Set + Digital ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK by Jordie Blasteroid (Elio Donatelli), le sinistre note elettroniche create appositamente per accompagnare con un brivido la lettura del fumetto!

SPACE EXTRA
SPACE T-SHIRT disegnata da Gianluca “Johnny” Pagliarani + 5 LOBBY CARD SET, gli esclusivi mini-poster con le scene più belle del fumetto + OFFICIAL CINEMA POSTER, il manifesto ufficiale in formato gigante (70x100 cm).

MOVIE EXTRA
PRESSBOOK, l’esclusivo libretto che raccoglie materiale inedito dei Blasteroid Bros + REEL TIN BOX, la scintillante scatola metallica a forma di bobina cinematografica + CINEMA POSTER COLLECTION (una raccolta delle 3 variant cover di THE SHADOW PLANET, stampate in grande formato (70x100) come se fossero le affiche delle versioni del film per il mercato estero!)


RAY-GUN REPLICA

La pistola di ognuno dei tre protagonisti, stampata in 3D da MAKEROBA di San Marino, rifinita e dipinta da Federico Cortesi (collettivo Barbanauti) a partire dai disegni di Gianluca Pagliarani. Ogni pistola è personalizzata con il codice alfanumerico del funder! Il prototipo è in corso di realizzazione ma qui potete ammirare un rendering di lavorazione.

MAQUETTE

Il diorama realizzato in esclusiva da Alan D’Amico e dipinto a mano, che ritrae i tre protagonisti e la mitica Moonette, il veicolo da sbarco più stiloso del cosmo!

Nomi nei ringraziamenti
I nomi dei nostri funders verranno inseriti TUTTI nell’edizione digitale di The Shadow Planet, mentre i nomi dei finanziatori che sceglieranno i perk dallo SPACE ROVER in su, saranno stampati nell’OFFICIAL CINEMA POSTER, il manifesto ufficiale di The Shadow Planet.

Per aggiungere un singolo oggetto al PERK che hai scelto basta integrare il valore indicato direttamente in donazione (o in un secondo momento con donazione libera) e poi mandare una mail all'indirizzo info@progettoradium.it con il nome dell'ADD ON nell'oggetto!



LOBBY CARDS
Il lobby card set di 5 stampe incluse nei perk sono le lobby della serie "CHARACTER" (vedi schema sottostante). Le lobby della serie "LANDSCAPE" sono disponibili solo come ADD ON (con l'aggiunta di 10 €).







JOHNNY
I disegni incredibilmente dettagliati di Gianluca hanno dato lustro alle pagine di molti titoli della Avatar Press, fra cui Aetheric Mechanics e Ignition City, entrambi scritti da Warren Ellis, Wolfskin e  Crossed 3D, scritto da David Lapham e candidato al Ghastly Award 2011. Gianluca attualmente lavora per Editions Soléil in Francia e Sergio Bonelli Editore in Italia, collocandosi fra i disegnatori di punta di Dragonero, il fantasy creato da Stefano Vietti e Luca Enoch. Il progetto Blasteroid Bros nasce da lui e dalla sua passione per la Retro Sci-Fi, cosa che condivide con lo scrittore e amico di lunga data Giovanni Barbieri.

JAMES
Giovanni scrive per i fumetti dal 1992, firmando fra gli altri albi di Lazarus Ledd, Hammer e Samuel Sand, passando poi a Eva Miranda, disegnata da Vittorio Giardino e altri graphic novel. Attivo nel campo della pubblicità e della comunicazione, si dedica anche a sceneggiature per serie TV (Winx Club, Pop Pixie) e a insegnare alla Scuola Internazionale di Comics di Firenze e Reggio Emilia. Oggi è editor dei progetti Radium e collabora con Sergio Bonelli Editore.

JUNIOR
Alan è un eclettico: scultore di miniature, illustratore per giochi di ruolo, di carte e da tavolo (Fantasy Flight, Kosmos, Clementoni) è anche colorista e disegnatore per albi a fumetti e serie TV (Winx Club, Teen Days). Insegna scultura alla Scuola Internazionale di Comics di Jesi. È un grande fan della Retro Sci-Fi ed è stato felice di unirsi ai suoi fratelli per THE SHADOW PLANET.
Scopri di più su https://alandamico.wordpress.com/



A cosa ci servono questi 29.000 €?

  • 20.000 € copriranno i compensi per sceneggiatura, disegno, colore, design delle cover, lettering e editing.
  • 6.000 € copriranno le spese di realizzazione delle ricompense e di stampa dei volumi.
  • 3.000 € copriranno le varie quote trattenute da Indiegogo e Paypal e per gli adempimenti fiscali.

La spedizione dei perk è inclusa nel prezzo del perk SOLO per la consegna presso uno dei PICK POINT elencati di seguito: BERGAMO (ComiXrevolution), BOLOGNA (Pop Store), COMO (Shin Crazy Comics), FIRENZE (Comics e dintorni), MESTRE (Supergulp), MILANO (Supergulp), MODENA (Intersezione srl), NAPOLI (Alastor), PARMA (Pop Store), REGGIO EMILIA (Reggio Comics 2), ROMA (Forbidden), TORINO (Pop Store), TREVISO (Supergulp)... e altri in arrivo!
L'elenco completo e aggiornato dei PICK POINT è visibile anche alla relativa pagina del sito (che puoi vedere cliccando qui!)

Per chi desiderasse ricevere il proprio perk direttamente a casa è necessario integrare con 5 € di contributo per le spese di spedizione o mediante donazione libera o direttamente come extra rispetto al prezzo del perk selezionato. Per tutti i perk che prevedono l'invio della REEL TIN BOX (la scatola di metallo in formato pizza cinematografica) è necessario integrare con ulteriori 3 € le spese di spedizioni (per un totale quindi di 8 € di spese di spedizione).
Per i perk che prevedono contenuti particolarmente delicati o ingombranti (EARLY BIRD, COMMISSION ...) vi chiediamo di contattarci in modo da concordare la modalità di consegna più economica e sicura sulla base delle vostre esigenze e della vostra posizione.
Per i residenti in Sicilia e Sardegna sarà necessaria un'ulteriore integrazione di 4 €
Quando sopra vale esclusivamente per le spedizioni su territorio italiano. Per le spedizione in territorio UE o EXTRA UE vi chiediamo di contattarci all'indirizzo info@progettoradium.it per concordare la spedizione più efficace ed economica.
Al termine della campagna verrà data comunicazione ai funders delle modalità per confermare in via definitiva (sul sito www.progettoradium.it)  il proprio indirizzo di spedizione. Le spedizioni dei materiali avverranno solo per chi effettuerà entro i termini indicati la conferma dell'indirizzo. Suggeriamo di indicare indirizzi di spedizione dove sia garantita la presenza negli orari di ufficio per evitare giacenze, rientri e conseguenti spedizioni che, qualora dovessero verificarsi, saranno a carico del destinatario.

Supporters
story_txt:
I Fratelli Blasteroid
presentano: il più terrificante horror di retro-fantascienza mai realizzato a
fumetti!THE SHADOW PLANET è il quarto progetto, dopo il successo di "Rim
City", "Quebrada - Seconda caduta" e di "Zeroi",
dell'etichetta indipendente RADIUM. Un film a fumetti di 80 pagine a colori, formato comic book, per rivivere il brivido dell’orrore cosmico creato
da H.P. Lovecraft in
un’ambientazione di retro-fantascienza alla “Pianeta Proibito”. Razzi, bulloni, scafandri spaziali e pianeti
alieni non sono mai stati più spaventosi… e sexy!Firmano questo cocktail di retro-SF, exploitation e horror i
Blasteroid Bros, il collettivo
creativo formato dallo sceneggiatore Giovanni "James" Barbieri, dal
disegnatore Gianluca "Johnny" Pagliarani e dal colorista Alan "Junior"
D'Amico. A controllare che i fratellini facciano tutto per bene c’è l’Editor ospite Stefano Vietti,
creatore con Luca Enoch di Dragonero,
il celebre fantasy di Sergio Bonelli Editore.
RADIUM è orgogliosa di offrire ai suoi affezionati funders
questa eccitante storia in due sontuose edizioni stampate, piene di contenuti
extra esclusivi e arricchite dalle
copertine di due superstar del fumetto: Mario
Alberti e Jacen Burrows! La vicenda inizia quando l’astronave Vidar del Comando Stellare
riceve un debole segnale di SOS proveniente da un pianeta disabitato.
Il comandante Jenna Scott sbarca con una pattuglia e trova i
resti di una precedente spedizione scientifica, misteriosamente scomparsa. 
Qualcuno o qualcosa, però, inizia a uccidere… è solo
l’inizio di una terrificante lotta per la sopravvivenza che svelerà lo
sconvolgente segreto di THE SHADOW PLANET!IL CASTJenna ScottIl comandante Scott può sembrare solo un bel bocconcino, ma
sa come farsi obbedire e risolvere ogni situazione... finché non atterra su THE
SHADOW PLANET.
John VargoIl sergente Vargo ha brutte abitudini e un pessimo
comportamento. Dovrà combattere fino all’ultimo per sopravvivere su THE SHADOW
PLANET.
Nikke LarssonIl luogotenente Larsson è un ottimo ufficiale alle
comunicazioni, ma resterà senza parole davanti all'orrore di THE SHADOW PLANET.
DIGITAL EDITION4 uscite digitali mensili + PDF "The Shadow Planet" Director's CutDIGITAL EXTRARADIUM Wallpaper Set + THE SHADOW PLANET Wallpaper Set + Digital ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK by Jordie Blasteroid (Elio Donatelli), le sinistre note elettroniche create appositamente per accompagnare con un brivido la lettura del fumetto!SPACE EXTRASPACE T-SHIRT disegnata da Gianluca “Johnny” Pagliarani + 5 LOBBY
CARD SET, gli esclusivi mini-poster con le scene più belle del fumetto + OFFICIAL
CINEMA POSTER, il manifesto ufficiale in formato gigante (70x100 cm).
MOVIE EXTRAPRESSBOOK, l’esclusivo libretto che raccoglie materiale
inedito dei Blasteroid Bros + REEL TIN BOX, la scintillante scatola metallica a
forma di bobina cinematografica + CINEMA POSTER COLLECTION (una raccolta delle 3 variant cover di THE SHADOW PLANET, stampate in grande formato (70x100) come se fossero le affiche delle versioni del film per il mercato estero!)
RAY-GUN REPLICALa pistola di ognuno dei tre protagonisti, stampata in 3D da
MAKEROBA di San Marino, rifinita e dipinta da Federico Cortesi (collettivo
Barbanauti) a partire dai disegni di Gianluca Pagliarani. Ogni pistola è
personalizzata con il codice alfanumerico del funder! Il prototipo è in corso di realizzazione ma qui potete ammirare un rendering di lavorazione.
MAQUETTEIl diorama realizzato in esclusiva da Alan D’Amico e dipinto
a mano, che ritrae i tre protagonisti e la mitica Moonette, il veicolo da
sbarco più stiloso del cosmo!Nomi nei ringraziamentiI nomi dei nostri funders verranno
inseriti TUTTI nell’edizione digitale di The Shadow Planet, mentre i nomi dei
finanziatori che sceglieranno i perk dallo SPACE ROVER in su, saranno stampati
nell’OFFICIAL CINEMA POSTER, il manifesto ufficiale di The Shadow Planet.Per aggiungere un singolo oggetto al PERK che hai scelto basta integrare il valore indicato direttamente in donazione (o in un secondo momento con donazione libera) e poi mandare una mail all'indirizzo info@progettoradium.it con il nome dell'ADD ON nell'oggetto!LOBBY CARDSIl lobby card set di 5 stampe incluse nei perk sono le lobby della serie "CHARACTER" (vedi schema sottostante). Le lobby della serie "LANDSCAPE" sono disponibili solo come ADD ON (con l'aggiunta di 10 €).JOHNNYI disegni incredibilmente dettagliati di Gianluca hanno dato lustro alle pagine di molti titoli della Avatar Press, fra cui Aetheric Mechanics e Ignition City, entrambi scritti da Warren Ellis, Wolfskin e  Crossed 3D, scritto da David Lapham e candidato al Ghastly Award 2011. Gianluca attualmente lavora per Editions Soléil in Francia e Sergio Bonelli Editore in Italia, collocandosi fra i disegnatori di punta di Dragonero, il fantasy creato da Stefano Vietti e Luca Enoch. Il progetto Blasteroid Bros nasce da lui e dalla sua passione per la Retro Sci-Fi, cosa che condivide con lo scrittore e amico di lunga data Giovanni Barbieri.JAMESGiovanni scrive per i fumetti dal 1992, firmando fra gli altri albi di Lazarus Ledd, Hammer e Samuel Sand, passando poi a Eva Miranda, disegnata da Vittorio Giardino e altri graphic novel. Attivo nel campo della pubblicità e della comunicazione, si dedica anche a sceneggiature per serie TV (Winx Club, Pop Pixie) e a insegnare alla Scuola Internazionale di Comics di Firenze e Reggio Emilia. Oggi è editor dei progetti Radium e collabora con Sergio Bonelli Editore.JUNIORAlan è un eclettico: scultore di miniature, illustratore per giochi di ruolo, di carte e da tavolo (Fantasy Flight, Kosmos, Clementoni) è anche colorista e disegnatore per albi a fumetti e serie TV (Winx Club, Teen Days). Insegna scultura alla Scuola Internazionale di Comics di Jesi. È un grande fan della Retro Sci-Fi ed è stato felice di unirsi ai suoi fratelli per THE SHADOW PLANET.Scopri di più su https://alandamico.wordpress.com/A cosa ci servono questi 29.000 €?
20.000 € copriranno i compensi per sceneggiatura, disegno, colore, design delle cover, lettering e editing.
6.000 € copriranno le spese di realizzazione delle ricompense e di stampa dei volumi.

3.000 € copriranno le varie quote trattenute da Indiegogo e Paypal e per gli adempimenti fiscali.




La spedizione dei perk è inclusa nel prezzo del perk SOLO per la consegna presso uno dei PICK POINT elencati di seguito: BERGAMO (ComiXrevolution), BOLOGNA (Pop Store), COMO (Shin Crazy Comics), FIRENZE (Comics e dintorni), MESTRE (Supergulp), MILANO (Supergulp), MODENA (Intersezione srl), NAPOLI (Alastor), PARMA (Pop Store), REGGIO EMILIA (Reggio Comics 2), ROMA (Forbidden), TORINO (Pop Store), TREVISO (Supergulp)... e altri in arrivo!L'elenco completo e aggiornato dei PICK POINT è visibile anche alla relativa pagina del sito (che puoi vedere cliccando qui!)Per chi desiderasse ricevere il proprio perk direttamente a casa è necessario integrare con 5 € di contributo per le spese di spedizione o mediante donazione libera o direttamente come extra rispetto al prezzo del perk selezionato. Per tutti i perk che prevedono l'invio della REEL TIN BOX (la scatola di metallo in formato pizza cinematografica) è necessario integrare con ulteriori 3 € le spese di spedizioni (per un totale quindi di 8 € di spese di spedizione).Per i perk che prevedono contenuti particolarmente delicati o ingombranti (EARLY BIRD, COMMISSION ...) vi chiediamo di contattarci in modo da concordare la modalità di consegna più economica e sicura sulla base delle vostre esigenze e della vostra posizione.Per i residenti in Sicilia e Sardegna sarà necessaria un'ulteriore integrazione di 4 €

Quando sopra vale esclusivamente per le spedizioni su territorio italiano. Per le spedizione in territorio UE o EXTRA UE vi chiediamo di contattarci all'indirizzo info@progettoradium.it per concordare la spedizione più efficace ed economica.Al termine della campagna verrà data comunicazione ai funders delle modalità per confermare in via definitiva (sul sito www.progettoradium.it)  il proprio indirizzo di spedizione. Le spedizioni dei materiali avverranno solo per chi effettuerà entro i termini indicati la conferma dell'indirizzo. Suggeriamo di indicare indirizzi di spedizione dove sia garantita la presenza negli orari di ufficio per evitare giacenze, rientri e conseguenti spedizioni che, qualora dovessero verificarsi, saranno a carico del destinatario.
Supporters

story:
Featured on Big Bang Theory!

We are excited to announce that the comic book cover was featured in last week's episode of "The Big Bang Theory! Contribute and jump to the front of the line for your personal copy of Issue #1 - "Hugh and Me and Leslie".

The Premise 

Baby Boomers got married and had children late in life. Now they’re dealing with midlife crisis, raising teens, dying parents, expensive college tuition, astronomical healthcare costs, empty nest syndrome, and a retirement age that keeps slipping farther and farther away – all at the exact same time.

People used to deal with these issues with the support of family, close friends, or a therapist.

                                              But now -- there is Facebook.

While generally considered something used by the young, Facebook has a large and growing middle-aged population posting photos, messages and stories from their current and past lives, and re-connecting with friends and lovers from high school, college, you name it.

What happens when Boomers dealing with these issues relive old memories and create new fantasies in this forum? Could this virtual world swap places with the real one they’re living? What complications occur when they 'friend' old lovers and stir up deep, long-forgotten feelings? What new truths are unleashed?

What happens, say, when after 40 years, one man finds out the unrequited love of his life was not unrequited.

The Story -

"Life Will Be Ecstasy" follows three such Boomers who have lost touch since they went to high school together in the Bronx in the late 1960s – John, Hugh and Leslie.

As they re-connect through Facebook, their old photos, messages, and music files act as flashbacks to their coming of age, and expose their first loves, passions, struggles, youthful insecurities, and larger than life dreams. We also see how their lives unfolded, and how they became who they are today.

Life, in fact, was not ecstasy....

---

The cover for Issue $1 is done! Now we just need your support to finish the insides!  And get great rewards for being a part....

The Future

We are very excited about this project. In fact, our goal is to grow this into a TV series! But one step at a time...

The first step is Issue # 1 - The Comic - titled "Hugh and Me and Leslie". If we go beyond our stated goal, we hope to produce one issue of the comic for every $2,500.

We do not expect any delays on the project once funded.. The story for issue #1 is already written, and many of the storyboards are sketched out. All we need to get going is the funding! However, this is art - not science! So, anything can happen! We will keep you appraised of any issues that come up in the process.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
‘Anubis: Dog of Death’ is an action comedy series about the Egyptian god of death. While once a powerful being, this comic sees him reduced to a tiny purse-dog due to how few people believe in him. All gods need believers to stay powerful. This comic sees Anubis meet many other gods from different religions, in similarly degenerated forms.

Each issue has 24 story pages + the cover + pages for summaries, backer rewards & credits.

The comic is written by me (SindrElf), and drawn by John Barry Ballaran.

 

 

Both issues have already been funded through Kickstarter, and John has finished almost all the art needed for issue #2.

I wanted to see if there's anyone interested in the comic on this platform, before we're ready to send it to print. Any additional funding we acquire can go toward funding issue #3.

 

 

Issue #1 - Standard cover in the middle stack. Limited edition cover for #1 is now unavailable.

 

 

Issue #2 - Standard cover:

 

 

Issue #2 - Limited edition cover, available as an add-on during checkout:

story:
Short Summary

Hey there! the Hush anthology came about from a group of friends desire to create a zine. I reached out on social media and found that a lot of people were interested in producing short term comics on a deadline that would help them stay focused. The Hush anthology currently counts over 50 artists under our umbrella and is signed with Nerdantix comics. This fundraiser will help us launch a website for hosting our work and also allow us to print our own books to distribute and also give to our artists.

Online Comic Samples:

  • Undeadly: https://www.nerdanatix.com/fullscreen-page/comp-jcdtlt33/79b1e72f-3a0d-4529-817e-e21a38cb5438/0/%3Fi%3D0%26p%3Dpz1fe%26s%3Dstyle-jcr0nrxb
  • Prin Vs Prin: https://www.nerdanatix.com/fullscreen-page/comp-jcdtlt33/79b1e72f-3a0d-4529-817e-e21a38cb5438/0/%3Fi%3D0%26p%3Dpz1fe%26s%3Dstyle-jcr0nrxb
  • Initiation: https://www.nerdanatix.com/fullscreen-page/comp-jcdtlt33/bc628b6d-495c-4fb3-9808-76bd6693b984/1/%3Fi%3D1%26p%3Dpz1fe%26s%3Dstyle-jcr0nrxb

 

GOALS FOR THIS CAMPAIGN
  • Raise enough to print a decent amount of books to be sold at conventions and comic book stores locally ( also to give to our artists and contributors)
  • Create a website where our artists have an easy, convenient way to display their work.
  • Introduce new artists to our project.
THE VISION

   This project is meant to create a support system of artists, and also a base for many people to get their work noticed or in print. We plan to take this project past volume one and volume two and eventually expand to specific cities and themes as our focus. Money was never a factor in the creation of this anthology, so many of our friends and artists worked for free, because they enjoy it, I do believe they deserve all the support and to see their work in print.

 

The Anthology was created by: 12 artists, sketched in one month, inked and finished in three. This was a challenge for many involved but they still all finished on a deadline.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk we have is not meeting a high enough goal to print books. We need at least two grand to print enough books for backers and our needs. We are going through Printninja because the samples we've seen look amazing.

Challenges may also include delays in shipping, printing or website launch. Everything is anticipated in spring of 2018.

GET INVOLVED!

Currently we are working on volume two, but we are always interested in new artists and thier stories. Pleasw email hushanthologyltd@gmail.com for more details.

story:
THE VIDEO ABOVE IS A TRAILER FOR A SEGMENT OF THE DVD DOWNLOAD THAT YOU CAN RECIEVE WITH A $50 DONATION TO THIS CAMPAIGN!

Summary

With the first story arc of FIXER wrapping up, we have recieved acclaim from fans and critics alike. However, we are still relatively unknown and unable to reach more fans. In 2013, we hope to change that with a promotional campaign set to help us reach a larger audience, and hopefully attract a publisher! Without these, we will be unable to make the 2nd story arc and move past chapter 13!
 
We met our goal so fast that we are overwhelmed! Thank you so much everyone! Here is where your money will be going, as well as further financial goals we have:
 
  1. Flyers - $150 MET!
  2. Facebook Ads - $250 (1 month) MET!
  3. Project Wonderful Ads - $400 (1 month) MET!
  4. Madicon - $700 MET!
  5. Tekkoshocon - $1200 MET!
  6. Anime Next - $1500 MET!
  7. Nekocon - $2000 MET!
  8. Otakon - $2500
  9. New York Comic-con - $3000

Note: Funding for all convention appearances will cover table costs, travel, and board.

What We Need & What You Get

Here is a list of things that your donations will help us do:

  • Buy ad space on Facebook.
  • Buy ad space with Project Wonderful.
  • Print promotional flyers.
  • Host booths and panels at anime and comic book conventions on the east coast.
  • Put together press and submission packets for potential publishers.

Here's what you could get for helping us:

  • An autographed 11x17 poster of a FIXER illustration of your choice.
  • A FIXER wallpaper set which can be used on your desktop, cellphone, and Facebook pages.
  • A full bound professional print of the final chapter of the 1st story arc.
  • A FIXER T-Shirt.
  • The Best of Tainted Reality Download Packet Vol. 2.

The Impact

  • By making donations, you will make it possible for us to:
  • Expand our fanbase so that even more people can experience the story of FIXER.
  • Make the possibility of us being professionally published much more likely.
  • Help ensure that the FIXER team will stay together and be able to complete all 6 planned story arcs!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Ask your friends to give FIXER a chance by giving the our webpage and asking them to read.
  • Post about our campaign in your social network outlets.
  • Cosplay our characters or create fan art! Post them on your social media outlet and e-mail them to us so we can publish them on our website!

 

NOTE: The TR VIP Pass & Artist Meet and Greet perk will be restricted to only participating Japanese musical artists managed by Tainted Reality for events within the United States. Tainted Reality is not responsible for your travel to the event you wish to redeem this perk at. A translator is not guarenteed to be on hand, and not all participating artists speak English. For any questions about this perk, please e-mail Roger at roger@taintedreality.net
story_txt:
THE VIDEO ABOVE IS A TRAILER FOR A SEGMENT OF THE DVD DOWNLOAD THAT YOU CAN RECIEVE WITH A $50 DONATION TO THIS CAMPAIGN!
Summary
With the first story arc of FIXER wrapping up, we have recieved acclaim from fans and critics alike. However, we are still relatively unknown and unable to reach more fans. In 2013, we hope to change that with a promotional campaign set to help us reach a larger audience, and hopefully attract a publisher! Without these, we will be unable to make the 2nd story arc and move past chapter 13!
 
We met our goal so fast that we are overwhelmed! Thank you so much everyone! Here is where your money will be going, as well as further financial goals we have:
 

Flyers - $150 MET!

Facebook Ads - $250 (1 month) MET!

Project Wonderful Ads - $400 (1 month) MET!

Madicon - $700 MET!

Tekkoshocon - $1200 MET!

Anime Next - $1500 MET!

Nekocon - $2000 MET!

Otakon - $2500
New York Comic-con - $3000
Note: Funding for all convention appearances will cover table costs, travel, and board.

What We Need & What You Get
Here is a list of things that your donations will help us do:

Buy ad space on Facebook.
Buy ad space with Project Wonderful.
Print promotional flyers.
Host booths and panels at anime and comic book conventions on the east coast.
Put together press and submission packets for potential publishers.

Here's what you could get for helping us:

An autographed 11x17 poster of a FIXER illustration of your choice.
A FIXER wallpaper set which can be used on your desktop, cellphone, and Facebook pages.
A full bound professional print of the final chapter of the 1st story arc.
A FIXER T-Shirt.
The Best of Tainted Reality Download Packet Vol. 2.



The Impact

By making donations, you will make it possible for us to:
Expand our fanbase so that even more people can experience the story of FIXER.
Make the possibility of us being professionally published much more likely.
Help ensure that the FIXER team will stay together and be able to complete all 6 planned story arcs!



Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Ask your friends to give FIXER a chance by giving the our webpage and asking them to read.
Post about our campaign in your social network outlets.
Cosplay our characters or create fan art! Post them on your social media outlet and e-mail them to us so we can publish them on our website!


 
NOTE: The TR VIP Pass & Artist Meet and Greet perk will be restricted to only participating Japanese musical artists managed by Tainted Reality for events within the United States. Tainted Reality is not responsible for your travel to the event you wish to redeem this perk at. A translator is not guarenteed to be on hand, and not all participating artists speak English. For any questions about this perk, please e-mail Roger at roger@taintedreality.net

story:
Hey there. Are you looking for something a little bit different? Alien Lives is a collection of weird science fiction and fantasy comics.

  • Brave New Girl: Young love is complicated, especially when it involves nuclear powered fertility symbols. 

  • Prince Redbreast: A prince seeking true love and an overly literal songbird in a fairy tale gone horribly wrong.

  • Requiem for a Marionette: Jack the marionette and Barry the bear are best friends. At least, they are until Jack catches a magic fish. Illustrated by Ambs Myers. 

  • Deep Snacky Space: The Space Corps bring peace, freedom, and prepackaged snack cakes to the universe. 

  • Kroper's Guide to Galactic Conquest: The savvy spaceman explains how you too can become a cosmic god in just three easy steps.

  • Instant Space Opera: A complete science fiction epic told in a single page of comics.

  • GreenBot: Never send an AI to do a mindless automaton's job. 

What We Need & What You Get

Alien Lives will be printed in North American pamplet size, in full color, with 32 interior pages. The stories will be presented in English and Korean with subtitles in Korean and English. Any contribution of $1 or more will net you the downloadable Alien Lives ebooks in pdf, cbr, or ePub formats.

For $50 or more, you can get a watercolor painting by Joseph Hewitt.

Most of the funds being collected will go towards printing- it will cost around $800 to print a thousand copies of the book. The remaining money will be used for shipping and additional goods such as posters and cards.

If the target of $900 is not reached by the end of the campaign, printing will be delayed until I can afford it. The ebook release, and the hand drawn art rewards, will still be delivered on schedule. If the target is exceeded, say $1200 or more, the book will be expanded to 40 pages.

Who Are You People?

I'm glad you asked. Joseph Hewitt is a cartoonist from Newfoundland, Canada who has been living in South Korea since the 90s. Polar Bear Comix is his imprint which produces bilingual comics, and can usually be found at all the major comikets.

Ambs Myers is the artist for the webcomic Killer Spoons.

Eunsuk Seo is the translator for Polar Bear Comix.

Onwards, Upwards, and Sideways

If you can't afford to contribute, you can still help out by telling your friends, clicking the share buttons, and otherwise helping to get the word out. Thanks!

story:
LIBERIA

 

Update 06/03/13 : 4000 view at the first video ! awesome !

Very soon, the tow next chapters of liberia online at http://cheesemonkey.fr

 

Mise à jour : Déjà plus de 4000 vues sur la bande annonce de Liberia !

Retrouvez très prochainement les chapitres 2 et 3 de Liberia en lecture en ligne sur cheesemonkey.fr !

 

UPDATE 05/15/13 : You can see an overview of LIBERIA in the gallery !

Mise à Jour 15/05/13 : Retrouvez un extrait de LIBERIA quand la galerie !

 

UPDATE 05/11/13 : You can now read the first chapter of LIBERIA Online ! http://cheesemonkey.fr/liseuse.html

 

Mise à Jour 11/05/13 : Vous pouvez désormais lire le premier Chapitre de LIBERIA directement en ligne ! suivez el lien : http://cheesemonkey.fr/liseuse.html

 

UPDATE 05/09/13 : 2000 view at the first video of LIBERIA !! It's so awesome !!!

 

Mise à Jour 09/05/13 : Déjà 2000 vues sur la bande annonce de LIBERIA !!!

 

UPDATE 05/04/13 : The first chapter of LIBERIA is now available to download at http://cheesemonkey.fr  !

 

Mise à Jour 04/05/13 : Vous pouvez désormais télécharger le chapitre 1 de LIBERIA sur http://cheesemonkey.fr !

 

UPDATE 04/22/13 : Follow us on Viadeo !

Mise à Jour 22/04/13 : La version Française des récompenses à été rajouté sur la droite de cette page !

Retrouvez nous désormais sur Viadeo !

 

UPDATE 04/16/13 : New Posters and Wanted !

Mise à Jour 16/04/13 : Nouveaux Posters et apparition des Wanted !

 

English / Français

 

 

------------- ENGLISH -------------

Hi everyone !!

What the heck is LIBERIA ??

Well, it's 99 and 44/100% dead, lots of dead, plus a huge lot of heat, blood and sweat. LIBERIA is a total immersion  in a world filled with dangers and fears! A world in which a team of bad-asses mercenaries will try to survive chaos in Sub-Saharan Africa.

Hired by a shady company based in north Liberia, colonel Greg BLASZCZYK – leader of the Blaszczyk Division (D.B.)- has to come up with a plan for a mission involving the rescue of a scientist from an entire hostile city. His team is somewhat unorthodox, the main characters being an autistic orphan, an ex free fighter and an aristocratic sniper, but their skills compensate widely. Will the plan come together?

Loosely based on reality (corruption, poverty, high mortality rate in this part of the world), the plot mixes horror, action, humor and emotion. LIBERIA thrives to become a huge hit among other frangas.

What's this CheeseMonkey Studio ?°_°?

Basically, we are a franga production studio. Our design aesthetic borrows respectfully from the Japanese manga style designs(black and white, dynamics...), but adds a bunch of westernized touches.

So, here we are, two motivated professionals with one goal: give you our best to keep you “on the read” and provide you with over-the-top comics.

The CheeseMonkey arose from our common will to share and make others profit from our skills and creativity. We want to make a difference and create the next manga generation. Our motto: Let them make “classics”, we draw “captivatings”!

You will quickly notice our graphical approach is new and medley efficiently dynamism and sensitivity.

The CheeseMonkey comes up with various themes:

You'll be able to read beautiful stories to your kids and share unforgettable memories with them; travel through the world and catch up with your dreams.

But wait, there's more!

You'll be able to get plenty of action, combat, fight and adrenaline!

Would you like even more?

You'll also be able to experience delighting romance, feel tenderness and passionate love.

LIBERIA will give you all those exiting sensations and much more !

What we need :

One million dollars, a helicopter and pizzas for everyone.

But seriously, here are the numbers and milestones:

  • 4 months : it's more or less what we need to produce LIBERIA Volume I (between 150 to 200 pages). Time estimated on the production of a first franga titled “The Martin Stream”(Le Ruisseau Martin). Could we hire just one assistant and we could increase production two times this rate.
  • 20 000€ : This is the basic amount we need to launch the studio. It covers production costs, derivative products, the Franga publication, postal packaging and communication including the website regular update.Plus, it will allow us to create a business able to hire an increasing number of employees, increase productivity and go further in the creative process.

This is a very promising and exciting project we are talking about ! We need your support !

What you get :

Like all creators, our success depends on you!

It's your participation that will trigger the CheeseMonkey Studio's development et the LIBERIA comic series' production.

Each reward is elaborated according to your donations and gives you the opportunity to get the CheeseMonkey Studio's products first hand:

10€ :

  • Not only will you get the first 3 Chapters of LIBERIA firsthand, you will also be able to download the full first Volume as soon as finished, plus a bonus of 6 character-sheets (pdf format) !

25€ :

  • You'll have access to the printed on paper version of the LIBERIA Vol. I ! More, you will also get an A2 format poster of one of the main characters ! (France only)

50€ :

  • We go to level 2 ! Here you'll have access to the printed on paper version of the LIBERIA Vol. I ! Also, you'll get 8 « WANTED » posters (A3 format) + 1 poster A2 « LIBERIA » !

        

75€ :

  • You'll get access to all previous rewards, plus the LIBERIA T-shirt  !

100€ :

  • Nothing less that the two previous rewards plus your Volume autographed and numbered.

150€ :

  • We give you the Volume autographed and numbered + 1 poster A2 format + 8 « WANTED » posters A3 format+ « les stickers » + a LIBERIA hoodedsweatshirt  !

200€ :

  • You will get all the previous rewards + 1 T-shirt. The sweatshirt and T-shirt will be signed if you want it!

400€ ( 10 max ) :

  • Attention ! Here you are the master ! You will get all that is included in the previous reward, but also you as a character in a short comic included at the end of the LIBERIA Vol. I !

1000€ (1):

  • You are the elite ! Not only do you already possess the privileged rewards of : 1 T-shirt + 1 hooded sweatshirt + an autographed and numbered LIBERA Volume I + 8 « WANTED » posters (A3 format) + 1 poster A2 « LIBERIA » + you as a character in a short comic included at the end of the LIBERIA Vol. I. but also, this character will appear in the original story ! You will be part of our soldiers of fortune's adventures !

10000€ (1):

  • Here you are, king of the hill ! The CheeseMonkey Studio VIP! You'll get a lifetime access to all CheeseMonkey Studio's products ! Every time a new product is issued, you will automatically receive one by postal way, for free ! And if you wish, we will autograph them.

12000€ (1) :

  • Unbelievable ! For this splendid amount, you become the emperor of donators. You'll benefit from the same previous reward plus a second CheeseMonkey Studio VIP PASS you can offer anyone you want !

You don't have money to invest BUT you wish to help the CheeseMonkey Studio's thriving ?

Well any kind of help could help!

What you can do is copy this link and share  : http://igg.me/at/CheeseMonkeyStudio-LIBERIA/x/2...

Communication is the key of start-ups' success !

Thank you very much for your time. We keep this page up to date on a regular basis to keep you informed of the Studio's progress.

                           

   ----------------  FRANCAIS  ----------------

 

LIBERIA

Bonjour à tous !

Qu'est ce que LIBERIA ??

Une chaleur écrasante, de l'hémoglobine et de la sueur. LIBERIA va vous plonger dans l'univers oppressant du mercenariat !

Une équipe endurcie va devoir, pour accomplir sa mission, survivre dans l'univers hostile d'une Afrique noire en plein chaos!

Sous contrat pour une société peu scrupuleuse, le capitaine BLASZCZYK est chargé de secourir un chercheur dans la ville de Monrovia. Son équipe : un ex-orphelin autiste, un free-fighter reconverti, une aristocrate sniper... Mais la mission ne se déroulera pas comme prévue...

Ancrée dans la réalité*, mêlant humour, action et sentiments, LIBERIA s'annonce comme le nouveau genre incontournable du franga.

*(corruption, misère économique, mortalité élevée, etc.)

Qu'est-ce que le CheeseMonkey Studio ?°_°?

Le CheeseMonkey Studio est un studio de production de Franga ! Le Franga est une bande dessinée occidentale basée sur un style graphique de type manga (noir et blanc, cases dynamiques et sens de lecture... de gauche à droite bien sûr!).

Au delà de ces termes techniques, nous sommes deux professionnels dynamiques et motivés qui donnons le meilleur de nous même pour satisfaire vos envies d'intrigues et de passions en tous genres !

Le CheeseMonkey est né d'une volonté commune de partager et de transmettre notre créativité et notre savoir faire. C'est ce qui fait la différence entre un scénario qui sera « classique » et celui qui sera « captivant ». De plus vous remarquerez rapidement que notre style graphique est novateur et associe efficacement dynamisme et émotion.

Le CheeseMonkey aborde des thèmes variés.

Vous pourrez lire de belles histoires à vos enfants et partager avec eux des instants inoubliables. Vous pourrez également apprécier de magnifiques paysages et retrouver vos rêves d'enfants.

Mais aussi !

Vivre l'ivresse du combat, de l'action, voir l'hémoglobine tâcher vos vêtements et recouvrir les murs !

Egalement !

Vous régaler de romances pulpeuses et enivrantes. Ressentir le souffle chaud d'une sublime créature embraser votre nuque !

LIBERIA vous apportera toutes ces sensations exaltantes et bien plus encore !

De quoi avons-nous besoin ?

Il est osé de faire des prévisions lorsqu'une activité comme la notre démarre. Néanmoins, voici quelques chiffres et dates qui vous permettront d'y voir plus clair :

  • 4 mois : Ceci est la date prévisionnelle de la parution de LIBERIA Tome I (Production d'un tome allant de 150 à 200 pages). Cette estimation est basée sur la production d'un premier Franga (Le Ruisseau Martin). Avec ne serait ce qu'un seul assistant nous pouvons diviser par deux ce délais !

  • 20 000€ : Cette somme représente la mise de base dont nous avons besoin pour lancer l'activité. Elle englobe tout; coûts de production pour les produits dérivés, la parution du Franga, les emballages pour les envois, la communication dont l'entretien du site internet.

    Egalement, cela nous permettrait de créer une entreprise capable d'avoir des salariés et d'accroitre l'activité de façon significative. Et surtout d'aller plus loin dans la démarche de création.

     

Nous développons un projet génial et extrêmement prometteur ! Nous avons besoin de votre soutien !

Qu'est-ce que vous y gagnez ?

Comme tous créateurs, notre succès dépend de vous !

C'est votre participation qui va permettre le développement du CheeseMonkey Studio et la production de la série LIBERIA.

Chaque récompense est adaptée à vos dons et vous offre la possibilité d'acquérir en avant première les produits du CheeseMonkey Studio :

10€ :

  • Vous aurez non seulement les 3 premiers chapitres en avant première, mais en plus, vous pourrez télécharger le premier tome en entier dès qu'il sera fini avec en bonus une série de 6 Chara arts (format pdf) exclusifs !

25€ :

  • Vous êtes en France? Vous souhaitez avoir votre album papier?! Il est ici pour vous ! Mais en plus de ça, vous aurez également 1 poster format A2 à l'effigie de vos personnages préférés du LIBERIA  !

50€ :

  • Nous passons un niveau au dessus ! Ici vous aurez accès à l'album papier du LIBERIA ! Ainsi que les 8 affiches « WANTED » format A3 + 1 poster A2 LIBERIA !

         

75€ :

  • Vous aurez accès aux mêmes récompenses que précédemment, mais en plus nous vous proposons le T-shirt LIBERIA !

100€ :

  • En plus des deux paliers de récompenses précédents, votre album sera dédicacé  et numéroté !

150€ :

  • Nous vous proposons L'album dédicacé et numéroté + 1 poster format A2 + les 8 affiches « WANTED » format A3 + un sweatshirt à capuche LIBERIA !

200€ :

  • Vous aurez les récompenses du palier précédent + 1 T-shirt, nous pourrons vous dédicacer à la demande les sweat-shirts et T-shirts !

400€ ( 10 max ) :

  • Attention ! Ici vous êtes le héros ! En effet pour cette somme vous aurez toutes les récompenses du palier précédent, mais en plus de cela vous aurez un personnage à votre éffigie qui apparaîtra dans les hors séries du LIBERIA !

1000€ (1):

  • Vous êtes l'élite ! Non seulement vous possédez déjà les récompenses des privilégiés qui comprennent : 1 T-shirt + 1 sweat-shirt à capuche + l'album dédicacé et numéroté + 8 posters « WANTED » format A3 + 1 poster A2 + un personnage à votre effigie dans les hors séries du LIBERIA. Mais en plus, ce personnage apparaîtra dans l'histoire originale du LIBERIA ! Vous ferez donc partie intégrante des péripéties de nos mercenaires !

10000€ (1):

  • Ici, vous êtes au sommet, le roi par delà les terres, vous êtes le VIP CheeseMonkey, vous aurez accès à tous les produits du CheeseMonkey Studio ! A la sortie de chaque nouveau produit, vous en recevrez automatiquement un gratuitement par colis. Nous vous proposerons de dédicacer chaque produit avant envoi.

12000€ (1) :

  • Incroyable ! Pour cette somme majestueuse, vous êtes l'empereur des donateurs. Vous bénéficiez de la même récompense que précédemment mais en plus vous aurez un deuxième PASS VIP CheeseMonkey Studio que vous pourrez offrir à la personne de votre choix.

Vous n'avez pas d'argent à investir mais vous souhaitez participer au succès du CheeseMonkey Studio ?

Toute aide est la bienvenue !

Vous pouvez copier et partager ce lien : http://igg.me/at/CheeseMonkeyStudio-LIBERIA/x/2...

La communication est la clé de toute entreprise !

Merci à tous pour avoir pris le temps de lire ces quelques lignes. Nous mettons régulièrement à jour cette page pour vous tenir informés de l'avancée du Studio.

You are the elite ! Not only do you already possess the privileged rewards of : 1 T-shirt + 1 hooded sweatshirt + an autographed and numbered LIBERA Volume I + 8 « WANTED » posters (A3 format) + 1 poster A2 « LIBERIA » + you as a character in a short comic included at the end of the LIBERIA Vol. I. but also, this character will appear in the original story ! You will be part of our soldiers of fortune's adventures !

10000€ (1):


Here you are, king of the hill ! The CheeseMonkey Studio VIP! You'll get a lifetime access to all CheeseMonkey Studio's products ! Every time a new product is issued, you will automatically receive one by postal way, for free ! And if you wish, we will autograph them.

12000€ (1) :


Unbelievable ! For this splendid amount, you become the emperor of donators. You'll benefit from the same previous reward plus a second CheeseMonkey Studio VIP PASS you can offer anyone you want !

You don't have money to invest BUT you wish to help the CheeseMonkey Studio's thriving ?
Well any kind of help could help! 
What you can do is copy this link and share  : http://igg.me/at/CheeseMonkeyStudio-LIBERIA/x/2...
Communication is the key of start-ups' success ! 
Thank you very much for your time. We keep this page up to date on a regular basis to keep you informed of the Studio's progress. 
                           
   ----------------  FRANCAIS  ----------------
 
LIBERIA
Bonjour à tous !
Qu'est ce que LIBERIA ??

Une chaleur écrasante, de l'hémoglobine et de la sueur. LIBERIA va vous plonger dans l'univers oppressant du mercenariat ! 
Une équipe endurcie va devoir, pour accomplir sa mission, survivre dans l'univers hostile d'une Afrique noire en plein chaos!
Sous contrat pour une société peu scrupuleuse, le capitaine BLASZCZYK est chargé de secourir un chercheur dans la ville de Monrovia. Son équipe : un ex-orphelin autiste, un free-fighter reconverti, une aristocrate sniper... Mais la mission ne se déroulera pas comme prévue...
Ancrée dans la réalité*, mêlant humour, action et sentiments, LIBERIA s'annonce comme le nouveau genre incontournable du franga.
*(corruption, misère économique, mortalité élevée, etc.)
Qu'est-ce que le CheeseMonkey Studio ?°_°?

Le CheeseMonkey Studio est un studio de production de Franga ! Le Franga est une bande dessinée occidentale basée sur un style graphique de type manga (noir et blanc, cases dynamiques et sens de lecture... de gauche à droite bien sûr!).
Au delà de ces termes techniques, nous sommes deux professionnels dynamiques et motivés qui donnons le meilleur de nous même pour satisfaire vos envies d'intrigues et de passions en tous genres !
Le CheeseMonkey est né d'une volonté commune de partager et de transmettre notre créativité et notre savoir faire. C'est ce qui fait la différence entre un scénario qui sera « classique » et celui qui sera « captivant ». De plus vous remarquerez rapidement que notre style graphique est novateur et associe efficacement dynamisme et émotion. 
Le CheeseMonkey aborde des thèmes variés.
Vous pourrez lire de belles histoires à vos enfants et partager avec eux des instants inoubliables. Vous pourrez également apprécier de magnifiques paysages et retrouver vos rêves d'enfants. 
Mais aussi ! 
Vivre l'ivresse du combat, de l'action, voir l'hémoglobine tâcher vos vêtements et recouvrir les murs !
Egalement !
Vous régaler de romances pulpeuses et enivrantes. Ressentir le souffle chaud d'une sublime créature embraser votre nuque !
LIBERIA vous apportera toutes ces sensations exaltantes et bien plus encore !
De quoi avons-nous besoin ?
Il est osé de faire des prévisions lorsqu'une activité comme la notre démarre. Néanmoins, voici quelques chiffres et dates qui vous permettront d'y voir plus clair :


4 mois : Ceci est la date prévisionnelle de la parution de LIBERIA Tome I (Production d'un tome allant de 150 à 200 pages). Cette estimation est basée sur la production d'un premier Franga (Le Ruisseau Martin). Avec ne serait ce qu'un seul assistant nous pouvons diviser par deux ce délais !



20 000€ : Cette somme représente la mise de base dont nous avons besoin pour lancer l'activité. Elle englobe tout; coûts de production pour les produits dérivés, la parution du Franga, les emballages pour les envois, la communication dont l'entretien du site internet.
Egalement, cela nous permettrait de créer une entreprise capable d'avoir des salariés et d'accroitre l'activité de façon significative. Et surtout d'aller plus loin dans la démarche de création.
 


Nous développons un projet génial et extrêmement prometteur ! Nous avons besoin de votre soutien !
Qu'est-ce que vous y gagnez ?
Comme tous créateurs, notre succès dépend de vous !
C'est votre participation qui va permettre le développement du CheeseMonkey Studio et la production de la série LIBERIA.
Chaque récompense est adaptée à vos dons et vous offre la possibilité d'acquérir en avant première les produits du CheeseMonkey Studio :
10€ :


Vous aurez non seulement les 3 premiers chapitres en avant première, mais en plus, vous pourrez télécharger le premier tome en entier dès qu'il sera fini avec en bonus une série de 6 Chara arts (format pdf) exclusifs !

25€ :


Vous êtes en France? Vous souhaitez avoir votre album papier?! Il est ici pour vous ! Mais en plus de ça, vous aurez également 1 poster format A2 à l'effigie de vos personnages préférés du LIBERIA  !

50€ :


Nous passons un niveau au dessus ! Ici vous aurez accès à l'album papier du LIBERIA ! Ainsi que les 8 affiches « WANTED » format A3 + 1 poster A2 LIBERIA !

         
75€ :


Vous aurez accès aux mêmes récompenses que précédemment, mais en plus nous vous proposons le T-shirt LIBERIA !

100€ :


En plus des deux paliers de récompenses précédents, votre album sera dédicacé  et numéroté !

150€ :


Nous vous proposons L'album dédicacé et numéroté + 1 poster format A2 + les 8 affiches « WANTED » format A3 + un sweatshirt à capuche LIBERIA !

200€ :


Vous aurez les récompenses du palier précédent + 1 T-shirt, nous pourrons vous dédicacer à la demande les sweat-shirts et T-shirts !

400€ ( 10 max ) :


Attention ! Ici vous êtes le héros ! En effet pour cette somme vous aurez toutes les récompenses du palier précédent, mais en plus de cela vous aurez un personnage à votre éffigie qui apparaîtra dans les hors séries du LIBERIA ! 

1000€ (1):


Vous êtes l'élite ! Non seulement vous possédez déjà les récompenses des privilégiés qui comprennent : 1 T-shirt + 1 sweat-shirt à capuche + l'album dédicacé et numéroté + 8 posters « WANTED » format A3 + 1 poster A2 + un personnage à votre effigie dans les hors séries du LIBERIA. Mais en plus, ce personnage apparaîtra dans l'histoire originale du LIBERIA ! Vous ferez donc partie intégrante des péripéties de nos mercenaires !

10000€ (1):


Ici, vous êtes au sommet, le roi par delà les terres, vous êtes le VIP CheeseMonkey, vous aurez accès à tous les produits du CheeseMonkey Studio ! A la sortie de chaque nouveau produit, vous en recevrez automatiquement un gratuitement par colis. Nous vous proposerons de dédicacer chaque produit avant envoi.

12000€ (1) :


Incroyable ! Pour cette somme majestueuse, vous êtes l'empereur des donateurs. Vous bénéficiez de la même récompense que précédemment mais en plus vous aurez un deuxième PASS VIP CheeseMonkey Studio que vous pourrez offrir à la personne de votre choix.

Vous n'avez pas d'argent à investir mais vous souhaitez participer au succès du CheeseMonkey Studio ?
Toute aide est la bienvenue ! 
Vous pouvez copier et partager ce lien : http://igg.me/at/CheeseMonkeyStudio-LIBERIA/x/2...
La communication est la clé de toute entreprise ! 
Merci à tous pour avoir pris le temps de lire ces quelques lignes. Nous mettons régulièrement à jour cette page pour vous tenir informés de l'avancée du Studio.

story:
Help to realize the Picture Book of Lilim!!

 

About the project

A picture book "The story of Lilim"

I would like produce a picture storybook, that is not for little kids, but written for teenagers and young adults.

I came up with the concept several years ago and have thought about it for long time. I now feel it is now the right time to realize it.

The pictures are mainly in black and white, and drawn with pens.

Visually, it is in the style of Japanese comics mixed withGerman Expressionism, like Edward Gorey or Tim Burton. The atmosphere can be likened to the world of Edger Allan Poe.

So a little bit gloomy and strange, but also funny and lovely; after my visual Motto "biting sweet".

The Theme of the story is maternal love and change of the character's heart.

 

The Story

This is the story of a little girl called “Lilim”.

Lilim is not a human being, she lives in a different world to the one we live in. 

Her father works relentlessly each day, as a collector of the human souls, and she (almost) always accompanies her father when he comes to this world to do his job, as she has already lost her mother.

 

One day, when she was accompanying the father as usual, but this time they get separated.

A strange girl from another world, landed in London at the end of the 19th century. Humans get horrified by her appearance and try to attack her.

A lady comes to her rescue,  when she looked her up, her face looked very similar to the portrait of her mother, which hangs at her home...

 

 

 

The Book


The book will be DIN A4 size (Landscape), Hardcover

32 (or 36?) pages in Black & White + little bit red.

Language : English

 

 

About me and What I need.

I, the author of this book, am Emiko Takano. I was born in Tokyo, Japan. I graduated from the University of Art in Germany and have worked as a freelance illustrator since then (also in Germany).  

To tell you the reason why I am asking for the support on this website, firstly, I must explain the current state of the art and design profession field here in Germany. 

 

In Germany It is very difficult for a freelance illustrator to obtain a sufficient income to sustain a stable life. 

It is particularly difficult for many novice illustrators and designers, who just graduated from art school to get a first job. It is thought that the reason for that is the overly cautious stance of corporate customers, publishers and agents, who buy the illustrations and design.

German publishers and companies, especially the large ones, are overly cautious, in other words very passive, about their businesses. They are reluctant to hire (use) a new illustrator unless they are absolutely convinced that it will be commercially successful.  This makes particularly hard for the novice illustrators to get into the field. Unless the illustrator has won a well-known award when he or she was a student, it takes between 2-3 years before an illustrator can get their first paying job. Many friends from art college have given up along the way and became office workers, retail assistants, housewives, etc. The current state is extremely hard for the young creators to have chance to develop their careers and many of them are forced to take another career path to earn an income to sustain themselves. 

Although an illustrator could imagine stories alone, and create graphic novels or picture books, if the creations were a little unique, and not in a main-stream style, they will not be purchased by the publishers, as the German publishers do not do any business unless they are sure it will sell.

 

As a result, Japanese manga and “weird” american comics (such as Lenore and Emily the strange) took a lot longer to get published in Germany, compared to other european countries - such as France or Italy.

There are some illustrators who start up a small publisher themselves and produce high quality books, but those books would hardly be seen by the general public, and only known among the insiders. 

This condition leads to the German illustration industry as a whole to be even more tedious and less interesting. As the publishers and companies only take the “safe bet,” i.e. by hiring only known veteran illustrators, outsourcing them from the other countries, or buying the copyright, Germany is now flooded with the same old illustrations. Even if some interesting ones come up, they often come from abroad. 

On the other hand, there are times when new and young illustrators get hired abruptly. Most of the time, however, it is because they can be used “cheaply”. It is not because they wanted to hire the particular illustrator, but rather to take advantage of novice illustrators who have no knowledge of copyrights and average pricing. In these cases, the illustrator is to fully comply with the style that the publisher wants. The quality of the work would often be put aside. And the illustrator would be over-worked on very low wages and treated like a machine. If the illustrator requests better treatment, the response would be that “there are plenty of others”. I also have had a similar experience. 

 

So those illustrators, who want to try something different, or to stick to their own style, find it extremely hard to develop their careers, even if they are very competent.  I find this current situation surrounding the illustrators in this country to be extremely disappointing and must be changed. 

In America, in that respect, that there is a spirit that even if it is a little different, people, not only the publishers and corporations, want to have a try. So this is the reason why I wanted to ask the support on this wonderful website. 

 

 

Why €6,000?

- €2000: To produce 500 copies of the hard cover book in Germany

 

- €1500: Shipping fee, wrapping materials and other stuff to ship the books

 

- The rest: To manage the life of me and my family, including my young, 3-year-old daughter for 3-4 months while I work on the book project (The average income of the German is monthly €2,000. I am working on the project already for 3 month and the book is still only 60% done!).

 

 

What you get

 

The goal of this project is to produce the book and to have shipped the book to the supporters.

This page will update regularly with the latest news involved the book project and the artist. So keep watching it!

At the moment I don't know if this project will be sold or distributed outside of indiegogo.com.

Of course I will try to ask publishers to produce the book from them but, as I already explained, it will be not so easy.

So if you want the book, just get it now!

 

 

Support Levels

 

- €5 Thank you in the Book

Your name will be onto the thank you page as a Supporter of the book

 

- €10 A digital version of the book

 

- €15 A signed book inclusive shipping fee (ONLY Europa)

 

- €20 A signed book inclusive shipping fee (out of Europa)

 

- €30 A signed book (incl. shipping) + a sketch of the main character

of the book on a postcard sized paper with your name.

 

- €50 A signed book (incl. shipping) + a personalized drawing

a original drawing of your favorite character

 

- €100 A signed book (incl. shipping) + all the digital drawing data

 

- €300 A signed book (incl. shipping) + an original Portrait of you or character of your choice

 

 

Other Ways You can Help

 Share, Tweet, Link, Reblog, The indiegogo share tools avobe. Any positive thought can help too!

story:
Mastrova.com is a new website aimed at being the best collectibles resources available.  We want to provide detailed information for every comic book and trading card that exists, as well as up to date pricing using data from actual completed sales (sample pricing page).  Not only that, but we also want to build a great community for collectors to come and share their knowledge and experiences, keep a detailed inventory of their collectibles and also show them off!  The reward tiers we're offering are a substantial discount from what our normal subscription prices will be (non-backer pricing is listed in each tier), so be sure to take advantage of the special pricing!

 

Front page of Mastrova
 

The website is currently in an open beta test and available for anyone to try out.  To use the inventory system, you'll just need to sign up for a free account.  You can visit the site at www.Mastrova.com.  Also, here is a forum post about what's working and what's not. 

Our current focus is on sports trading cards and comic books.  At present our database has over 1.7 million baseball cards and we’re in the process of finalizing the initial data for over 2.5 million football, hockey and basketball cards.  We are also hard at work on building up our comics database, which now stands at 25,000 issues.  We’re adding thousands of issues weekly and should have this fleshed out to over 500,000 issues by the time the price guide portion of the site launches.  Once we have this information up to date, we’ll be adding other sports such as boxing, tennis, soccer, golf, wresting, etc. as well as non-sports and entertainment cards.

 

Search results page
 

Many of our features will also be offered completely free!  This includes our "Vault" inventory system which is currently up and running for sports cards and available for testing.  You can create your own inventory folders and then add items that you own, items that are on your want list, or items that you have available for trade or sale.  We are currently working on the code to make this active for comic books as well.  Our checklists and search engine will also be available without any fees whatsoever.  

Vault inventory system

 

The price guide portion of the site will be subscription fee based feature.  While we would love the make this free as well, unfortunately we need to pay for the cost of running the site and will need to hire additional employees as the site grows.  There is a ton of work involved with the validation of the data we grab and syncing it with our database.  With all the features we want to add and the amount of data we want to track, it just isn't feasible to offer this for free.  Having said that, we think the pricing levels we have come up with are very fair, flexible and affordable.  

 

Sample pricing page
 

So what are we going to use the funding for?  The main project we have at Mastrova right now, is getting the price guide up and running.  Our main source of pricing is going to be finalized sales from eBay of graded cards and comics.  Basically for us to display the finalized sale prices from eBay, we need to pay them to license the data.  We would also like to use a portion of the money to hire another employee to help with the data entry and validation, it’s quite a bit of work and we can use the help!  Another portion of the money would go to buying a couple software tools that we think will really improve our site and make it stand out, while greatly enhancing the experience for our customers.

Once we get the price guide and data established, we have many more ideas and plans in the works.  We'll be adding more inventory features in the coming months, as well as special checklisting features tailored to collectors of individual players, sets and comic titles.  We hope to have a full featured marketplace and trading system by the end of 2013 that will allow our customers to create virtual store fronts or run auction style sales.  We will also continually be updating our databases with new releases, adding images, and adding as much info as possible.

Thanks for checking us out and we hope you enjoy our site and are as excited about it as we are!
